programme.title: Leonardo
programme.desc: A través de sus obras se cuenta la historia de cómo Leonardo da Vinci se fue convirtiendo en un genio incomparable, cuyo trabajo rompió las reglas del orden establecido.

programme.title: Comando Actualidad
programme.desc: Programa que emite una serie de reportajes de actualidad que analizan los temas sociales desde diferentes perspectivas. Cada semana, a mano de un grupo de reporteros, el programa recorre distintas partes de España para tratar problemáticas sociales.

programme.title: La noche en 24 horas
programme.desc: Programa informativo en el que combinan entrevistas y análisis de la actualidad política presentado por un grupo de periodistas destacados de distintos medios de comunicación.

programme.title: Noticias 24h
programme.desc: Noticias de los servicios informativos que está dedicado íntegramente a ofrecer información de actualidad y es el más antiguo de los canales de este tipo en España.

programme.title: Noticias 24h
programme.desc: Noticias de los servicios informativos que está dedicado íntegramente a ofrecer información de actualidad y es el más antiguo de los canales de este tipo en España.

programme.title: Telediario Matinal
programme.desc: Exhaustivo repaso de todas las noticias de interés general, tanto nacionales como internacionales y deportivas, la información de la bolsa y sorteos.

programme.title: La hora de La 1: La hora política
programme.desc: Programa que trata informaciones de temas variados, pero siempre muy ligados a la actualidad: política, sucesos, ciencia y crónica social.

programme.title: La hora de La 1: La hora de la actualidad
programme.desc: Abordamos la actualidad social del día a día y contamos con voces autorizadas que tratarán temas que fomenten el pensamiento crítico y el servició público para ayudar a los ciudadanos. Esta parte del programa busca entretener y divertir.

programme.title: Las cosas claras
programme.desc: El programa cuenta de forma plural lo que afecta al ciudadano: información diaria, inquietudes sociales, económicas, realidades medioambientales, denuncia, consumo, lo que pasa en la ciudad, en los pueblos, en las redes, cultura, gastronomía.

programme.title: Telediario 1
programme.desc: El Telediario de la 1, que tiene tres ediciones diarias, informa de las noticias más relevantes en los ámbitos nacional, internacional, social y deportes.

programme.title: Informativo Territorial
programme.desc: La 1 restrasmite este programa informativo con todas las noticias territoriales de las autonomías españolas.

programme.title: El tiempo
programme.desc: Presentación de la información sobre el pronóstico meteorológico de todas las provincias a nivel nacional.

programme.title: Dos vidas
programme.desc: Julia debe continuar su trabajo en el taller sin Elena. Mientras tanto, Sergio intenta poner todo de su parte para que se note la ausencia de la trabajadora. En Guinea, Carmen informa a su entorno de que ha decidido quedarse en la colonia.

programme.title: Servir y proteger
programme.desc: Por un lado, María se entera por Paty de que Paco es un seductor y le pone en su sitio. Por otro lado, Salgado y Miralles confirman la relación entre Lorenzo Arjona y Ramiro y deducen que éste lo mató.

programme.title: El cazador
programme.desc: Formato en el que cuatro concursantes anónimos unen sus conocimientos para ganar al cazador, un auténtico profesional de los concursos televisivos. Se trata de un concurso que se ha adaptado en más de 8 países.

programme.title: España Directo
programme.desc: Un magazín que hace una crónica social de España, escapadas, el tiempo, fiestas, reportajes y recetas de cocina, además de mucho entretenimiento.

programme.title: Aquí la Tierra
programme.desc: Una mirada sobre cómo la salud, la arquitectura, la conducta, incluso el arte o la economía, pueden estar condicionados por la meteorología.

programme.title: Telediario 2
programme.desc: Ana Blanco da la cara por los cientos de profesionales de TVE que salen cada día a la calle en busca de noticias. El resultado, un completo repaso a la actualidad nacional e internacional. Jesús Álvarez se ocupa de presentar la parcela deportiva.

programme.title: El tiempo
programme.desc: Presentación de la información sobre el pronóstico meteorológico de todas las provincias a nivel nacional.

programme.title: El dragón
programme.desc: Tras convertirse en un rico y exitoso hombre de negocios en Japón, Miguel Garza regresa a México para ser el líder del negocio familiar con sus habilidades de hacker y así poder cambiar el mundo de la delincuencia internacional.

programme.title: Pare de sufrir
programme.desc: Los pastores brasileños de la Iglesia Universal Pare de Sufrir producen este espacio dirigido a los fieles de la religión cristiana y se realizan transmisiones en vivo del culto. Se tratan temas y testimonios sobre espiritualidad, mejoramiento personal y crecimiento individual. Por medio de reflexiones sobre la familia y el amor de Dios, este espacio pretende orientar e instruir sobre temas relevantes a la religión cristiana y a los dilemas que se presentan en el día a día. Mediante la conversación y la puesta en común de diferentes temas, el programa lleva consejos al público y se discuten temas espirituales y de superación personal.

programme.desc: Una nueva perspectiva de la información y los comentarios sobre los hechos más destacados al descubierto.

programme.title: Al Aire, con Paola Rojas
programme.desc: Cobertura de las noticias más destacadas a nivel nacional e internacional y los titulares de la actualidad.

programme.title: Hoy
programme.desc: El título del programa es la parte central de este e incluye segmentos informativos sobre todo lo referente al enriquecimiento del día a día de las personas, esta serie también aporta consejos útiles y prácticos para la realización de las actividades diarias, facilitando las labores comunes y corrientes y mejorando la calidad de vida. Sus notas ligeras incluyen segmentos sobre culinaria, sexualidad, belleza y novedades, incluye invitados especiales del mundo del entretenimiento, reportajes sobre la farándula y actualiza a la audiencia sobre las noticias más importantes del momento, la revista informativa demás da a conocer los resúmenes de las novelas más populares y el horóscopo para cada signo del zodiaco. Las notas se presentan con un toque de chispa, humor y mucho picante.

programme.title: Cuéntamelo ya
programme.desc: Un programa que proporciona información de manera divertida y cordial sobre los famosos, además de entrevistas, cápsulas y mucho más.

programme.title: Minuto para ganar
programme.desc: Diez desafíos, un gran premio y sólo una hora para poder obtenerlo son los ingredientes de este divertido concurso conducido por Marco Antonio Regil. Cada noche los concursantes deberán completar disparatados retos en menos de 60 segundos para evitar ser eliminados. Los elementos de uso cotidiano del hogar se convierten en divertidos juegos en donde las alfombras de baño sirven como trineos, los lápices se vuelven complicados aparatos de ingeniería y las latas de refresco son obstáculos de equilibrio. Al final, tendrán que completar el reto de "La moneda millonaria y en menos de 60 segundos deben hacer que una moneda aterrice dentro de un jarro de agua localizado a 4 metros de distancia. Un ingenioso programa de concursos que mantendrá a los televidentes al filo de sus sillas.

programme.title: La fuerza del destino
programme.desc: La historia de amor entre Iván y Lucía, quienes deberán luchar por su amor cuando el pasado se interpone a su felicidad.

programme.title: Diseñando tu amor
programme.desc: Valentina y Nora, dos hermanas con personalidades diferentes, comparten el deseo de destacarse en el mundo de la industria de la moda.

programme.title: Como dice el dicho
programme.desc: La serie "Como Dice el Dicho" producida por Televisa, recrea durante una hora historias y situaciones que se asemejan a los dichos comunes de la cultura popular. La gente se refiere a un dicho cuando cierta situación que sucede encaja con este, y el refrán en cuestión sale a relucir, la idea del programa es dramatizar una historia interesante y cautivadora que represente un dicho específico, elegido para cada episodio, en uno de los episodios se representa por ejemplo, "El que a hierro mata a hierro muere". El encargado de comentar los dichos es Don Tomás, un hombre mayor, buena gente, optimista y seguro que siempre tiene un consejo para todos los que pasan por su cafetería, cuyo papel es interpretado por el actor Sergio Corona, junto a él lo acompañan la actriz Wendy González quien es Isabel, una joven inteligente y simpática, y Michael Ronda, interpretando a Poncho un niño pícaro encantador.

programme.title: La Rosa de Guadalupe
programme.desc: Cada episodio de sesenta minutos en la serie "La Rosa de Guadalupe", incluye la dramatización de un caso de personas comunes que experimentan un milagro verdadero realizado por la Virgen de Guadalupe , las historias relatadas en el programa son una fuente de inspiración y esperanza para las personas que estén atravesando por un problema, el misterio, el desconcierto y asombro son sentimientos comunes que se generan al ver este programa. El título de esta serie proviene de la leyenda que al pedir un milagro a la Virgen de Guadalupe, se coloca una rosa al frente de la imagen y se le reza.

programme.title: ¿Qué le pasa a mi familia?
programme.desc: Regina Rueda es la ambiciosa asistente ejecutiva del presidente de una importante empresa textil. Tras un fracaso sentimental, Regina no cree en el amor, hasta que conoce a Patricio, un importante empresario.

programme.title: El dragón
programme.desc: Tras convertirse en un rico y exitoso hombre de negocios en Japón, Miguel Garza regresa a México para ser el líder del negocio familiar con sus habilidades de hacker y así poder cambiar el mundo de la delincuencia internacional.

programme.title: En punto con Denise Maerker
programme.desc: Noticiero con una propuesta orientada a dar mayor profundidad a la noticia e incorporando reportajes de investigación.

programme.title: 40 y 20
programme.desc: Paco es un cuarentón divorciado que se enloquece con las jovencitas y vive con su hijo Fran, un veinteañero con debilidad por las cuarentonas. La única que no parece estar de acuerdo es Rocío, la exesposa y madre.

programme.title: Contacto deportivo

programme.title: Pare de sufrir
programme.desc: Los pastores brasileños de la Iglesia Universal Pare de Sufrir producen este espacio dirigido a los fieles de la religión cristiana y se realizan transmisiones en vivo del culto. Se tratan temas y testimonios sobre espiritualidad, mejoramiento personal y crecimiento individual. Por medio de reflexiones sobre la familia y el amor de Dios, este espacio pretende orientar e instruir sobre temas relevantes a la religión cristiana y a los dilemas que se presentan en el día a día. Mediante la conversación y la puesta en común de diferentes temas, el programa lleva consejos al público y se discuten temas espirituales y de superación personal.

programme.title: Hermanas de sangre
programme.desc: Una mujer debe proteger a su familia cuando su hermana, quien es una enferma criminal, reingresa a la sociedad.

programme.title: Una de esas chicas
programme.desc: Cuando un vídeo de sexo de Deanna y Tommy de 13 años de edad se vuelve viral, su vida de inocencia termina. Tres años después, Deanna todavía está lidiando con las consecuencias del vídeo y anhela escapar de la vida definida por los errores de su pasado.

programme.title: ¿Por amor o por dinero?

programme.title: Amor en el aire
programme.desc: Las cuatro parejas concluyen la última etapa de su aventura de ocho paradas a campo traviesa; revelando quién encontró el amor y quién encontró un boleto solo de ida hacia la casa.

programme.title: Una de esas chicas

programme.title: Pasarela 24hs
programme.desc: Creando un atuendo caprichoso; una colección para resaltar la belleza natural de la mujer.

programme.title: Alerta aeropuerto: Lima

programme.title: Fronteras al límite

programme.title: Traficantes

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Madrid

programme.title: Alerta Aeropuerto: Roma

programme.desc: El paso de un huracán trae nuevos casos a la consulta de la doctora: una tortuga que fue aplastada por un automóvil, una cría de cerdo que necesita atención sanitaria y un guacamayo en problemas.

programme.title: Cesar 911
programme.desc: Cesar visita una mujer que ha llamado sobre el terrier de un vecino, Toby, que está causando problemas en el vecindario.

programme.title: El increíble Dr. Pol
programme.desc: El Dr. Pol y el personal de la clínica tienen mucho en juego, ya que los animales del centro de Michigan se encuentran en una complicación tras otra.

programme.title: Océanos profundos
programme.desc: La Antártida es el lugar más frío de la Tierra, es muy hostil para la vida en la superficie, pero bajo el agua todo es diferente. Biólogos marinos exploran uno de los lugares más exóticos del planeta.

programme.title: El club de la pelea animal
programme.desc: Las llanuras africanas son el hogar de los depredadores más temibles del mundo: guepardos, leones, hienas. Pero la batalla por la supervivencia no siempre está decidida, ya que también las presas son formidables.

programme.title: El club de la pelea animal
programme.desc: Cada día, en todo el mundo, los animales luchan brutalmente por el territorio, la comida y la compañía. Por mar, tierra y aire, un vistazo a las mayores batallas y terribles luchas del reino animal.

programme.title: Animales mortales
programme.desc: Desde orcas hasta alces, hay muchos animales que pueden hacerles daño a los humanos. Michelle y Filipe hablan de estos animales y cómo evitarlos.

programme.title: Muerto al amanecer
programme.desc: Los animales, desde el desierto de Arabia hasta las selvas tropicales de Costa Rica, se enfrentan cara a cara con sus peores pesadillas. ¿Correrán, pelearán o morirán al amanecer?

programme.title: Yukon Vet
programme.desc: Dos cachorros de oso que se recuperan de una terrible experiencia necesitan la ayuda de la Dra. Oakley para emprender un largo viaje hacia un nuevo hogar. Lo que debía ser una simple cirugía podría ser más complicada para un labrador retriever.

programme.title: Secretos veterinarios
programme.desc: Una elefanta entra en trabajo de parto. Además, un conducto radicular para un oso polar.

programme.title: Dra. T. Lone: Desafíos veterinarios
programme.desc: Una hembra de guacamayo escarlata necesita la ayuda de la Dra. T para llegar hasta una zona irritada que no se puede rascar. Un par de crías de petauros del azúcar acuden a la consulta en su primera visita al veterinario.

programme.title: El increíble Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Los doctores trabajan las veinticuatro horas del día, los siete días de la semana, para salvar vidas.

programme.title: Depredadores africanos
programme.desc: Dos grandes leones macho, que son hermanos mellizos y comparten un fuerte vínculo, lideran la manada Nsefu desde hace tres años. Son padres de todos los cachorros y los protectores de su territorio.

programme.title: Cuando los predadores atacan
programme.desc: En la naturaleza y en los hogares, las serpientes son reptiles formidables que usan su veneno o fuerza física para vencer a sus presas y a las personas. Con la reducción de sus hábitats naturales, los encuentros cercanos con ellas son más comunes.

programme.title: Las serpientes más peligrosas
programme.desc: El Indo-Pacífico es el hogar de víboras que atacan rápido: pitones gigantes y cobras.

programme.title: Cazadores vs. cazados
programme.desc: Un atleta en Colorado corre por su vida. Además, un pacífico paseo por los bosques canadienses se torna letal. Cuando las personas se sumergen en el reino de los animales salvajes, un encuentro fortuito puede costarles la vida.

programme.title: El club de la pelea animal
programme.desc: Los enfrentamientos más salvajes y las peleas más sangrientas mientras los animales luchan ferozmente por sobrevivir.

programme.title: Animales mortales
programme.desc: Las probabilidades de ser atacado por un animal pueden ser escasas, pero nunca cero. Un vistazo a diez formas en las que se podría morir y, quizás, cómo evitarlo.

programme.title: Muerto al amanecer
programme.desc: Cuando cae el sol, emergen peligros mortales. En el desierto de Arabia, un geco se da cuenta de que no está solo. En el desierto africano, un cachorro de león llora por su madre mientras una hiena le acecha.

programme.title: Wild Corea
programme.desc: La zona desmilitarizada de Corea se encuentra en la frontera entre dos naciones que han estado en conflicto durante casi 70 años. Los cercos, las minas terrestres y las cenizas de la guerra conviven con una tierra de naturaleza extraordinaria.

programme.title: Serpientes en la ciudad

programme.title: Cesar 911

programme.desc: Todo, desde exitosos cazadores hasta animales extremadamente extraños viven en el corazón de Sudáfrica.

programme.title: The Comey Rule
programme.desc: A virtual day-by-day account of the tempestuous relationship between Comey and Trump and the intense and chaotic first months of the Trump presidency.

programme.title: A Call to Spy
programme.desc: At the dawn of World War II, a desperate Winston Churchill orders his new spy agency to train women for covert operations. Together, these female agents help undermine the Nazi regime in France, leaving an unmistakable legacy in their wake.

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: Jake, Jemma and Kevin organize an on-campus protest; Emmett and Tiff set new boundaries for their relationship; Imani schemes to break a girl out of the 63rd St. Mob's trap house; Nina is suspicious of Dre; Jada gives Emmett some unexpected news.

programme.title: Black Monday
programme.desc: Mo tries to keep up with Nomi, but he comes to realize that he can't party like he used to; Dawn's attempt to get him to slow down backfires; Pastor Newell's funeral planning goes off the rails and ends with a bang.

programme.title: Flatbush Misdemeanors
programme.desc: Kevin spends a 'shrooms-filled night out with his successful sister which leads to a series of revelations; in an effort to make Dan bond with his stepdad, Dan's mom drags him into competing in the Greenest Block in Brooklyn contest.

programme.title: Sacrifice
programme.desc: A New Yorker and his pregnant wife return to the Norwegian village of his birth to claim an unexpected inheritance. They soon find themselves in a living nightmare when they encounter a sinister cult that worships a sea-dwelling deity.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: In this chilling adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, withdrawn and sensitive teen Carrie White (Sissy Spacek) faces taunting from classmates at school and abuse from her fanatically pious mother (Piper Laurie) at home. When strange occurrences start happening around Carrie, she begins to suspect that she has supernatural powers. Invited to the prom by the empathetic Tommy Ross (William Katt), Carrie tries to let her guard down, but things eventually take a dark and violent turn.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Repairmen Val McKee (Kevin Bacon) and Earl Bassett (Fred Ward) are tired of their dull lives in the small desert town of Perfection, Nev. But just as the two try to skip town, they happen upon a series of mysterious deaths and a concerned seismologist (Finn Carter) studying unnatural readings below the ground. With the help of an eccentric couple (Reba McEntire, Michael Gross), the group fights for survival against giant, worm-like monsters hungry for human flesh.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Brilliant and obese scientist Sherman Klump (Eddie Murphy) invents a miraculous weight-loss solution. After a date with chemistry student Carla Purty (Jada Pinkett) goes badly, a depressed Klump tries the solution on himself. Though he instantly loses 250 pounds, the side effects include a second personality: an obnoxiously self-assertive braggart who calls himself Buddy Love. Buddy proves to be more popular than Sherman, but his arrogance and bad behavior quickly spiral out of control.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Professor Sherman Klump (Eddie Murphy) is getting married. And the Klump family could not be more delighted. His fiancee Denise (Janet Jackson) is thrilled to become a Klump, and with her appetite she'll fit right in. But Buddy Love ... well, Buddy is another matter.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: After surviving an assault from a squad of hit men, retired CIA agent Frank Moses (Bruce Willis) reassembles his old team for an all-out war. Frank reunites with old Joe (Morgan Freeman), crazy Marvin (John Malkovich) and wily Victoria (Helen Mirren) to uncover a massive conspiracy that threatens their lives. Only their expert training will allow them to survive a near-impossible mission -- breaking into CIA headquarters.

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: An entrepreneur and his family begin to unravel after moving into an old country manor in England in the 1980s.

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Redford stars as CIA operative Nathan Muir, who is on the brink of retirement from the field, when he learns his protégé Tom Bishop has been arrested in China on a charge of espionage. No stranger to the machinations of the CIA's top echelon, Muir hones all his skills and irreverent manner in order to find a way to free Bishop.

programme.title: Alex Cross
programme.desc: Alex Cross (Tyler Perry) works as a detective/psychologist for the Detroit Police Department along with his lifelong friend, Tommy Kane (Edward Burns), and detective Monica Ashe (Rachel Nichols). Cross' latest case puts him on a collision course with Picasso (Matthew Fox), a cunning serial killer whose ultimate target is multinational industrialist Giles Mercier (Jean Reno). Cross must find a way inside Picasso's head not only to catch the killer but also to stem the violent urges Cross feels.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Brilliant and obese scientist Sherman Klump (Eddie Murphy) invents a miraculous weight-loss solution. After a date with chemistry student Carla Purty (Jada Pinkett) goes badly, a depressed Klump tries the solution on himself. Though he instantly loses 250 pounds, the side effects include a second personality: an obnoxiously self-assertive braggart who calls himself Buddy Love. Buddy proves to be more popular than Sherman, but his arrogance and bad behavior quickly spiral out of control.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris (Queen Latifah) has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter (Paige Hurd) and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge (Kevin Bacon), Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn (Alicia Silverstone) and Terri (Andie MacDowell), respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: Love Fraud
programme.desc: Tracy and Mickey's courtship is a dizzying ride that ends with an engagement ring, but Tracy's daughters think it's all moving too fast and break into Mickey's truck to find out the truth.

programme.title: Love Fraud
programme.desc: Carla the bounty hunter is in search of con man Richard Scott Smith; sing tips from a blog created by his victims, Carla stumbles on a lead: Smith may be posing as a restaurateur right there in Kansas; it turns out Carla is not the only person keen to find Smith; enter Jim, whose wife has emptied his 401(k) and run off with Smith to chase her dreams of owning a seafood empire; throw in a lone local PI and some filmmakers, and it's a race to the Krab Kingz in Wichita.

programme.title: Love Fraud
programme.desc: The "revenge squad" in Kansas City receives a disturbing tip that one of Smith's exes in the south is hiding him at her place. The clue takes the story to Knoxville, Tennessee, where a new cast of surprising characters emerges and thickens the plot.

programme.title: Love Fraud
programme.desc: How many others are there? Richard Scott Smith's secrets seem endless. His past is continuing to unravel and may finally be catching up with him. With the help of Carla the bounty hunter and a team of savvy local private investigators, Smith's victims decide it's time to take a road trip and stop Rick once and for all. They've finally got him cornered. Is Richard Scott Smith's trail of deceit and heartbreak finally over?

programme.title: Ziwe
programme.desc: Ziwe investigates whitewashing in Hollywood with guest Adam Pally and showcases the trailer for her biopic; musical guest: Ziwe.

programme.title: Alex Cross
programme.desc: Alex Cross (Tyler Perry) works as a detective/psychologist for the Detroit Police Department along with his lifelong friend, Tommy Kane (Edward Burns), and detective Monica Ashe (Rachel Nichols). Cross' latest case puts him on a collision course with Picasso (Matthew Fox), a cunning serial killer whose ultimate target is multinational industrialist Giles Mercier (Jean Reno). Cross must find a way inside Picasso's head not only to catch the killer but also to stem the violent urges Cross feels.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross (Laura Linney) is sent by her father-in-law, mogul R.B. Travis (Joe Don Baker), to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly (Ernie Hudson), Ross and a mismatched search party -- including primatologist Dr. Peter Elliot (Dylan Walsh), treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka (Tim Curry) and a gorilla -- discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Conan the Destroyer
programme.desc: In his second cinematic adventure, the mighty warrior Conan (Arnold Schwarzenegger) is tricked into working for the scheming Queen Taramis (Sarah Douglas). Along with finding a mystical horn, Conan and his allies, which include the fierce fighter, Zula (Grace Jones), and the wisecracking sorcerer, Akiro (Mako), must protect the beautiful young Princess Jehnna (Olivia d'Abo). With deception and danger at every turn, Conan has to use all of his power to defeat the evil foes that stand in his way.

programme.title: Dick
programme.desc: Betsy (Kirsten Dunst) and Arlene (Michelle Williams) are two 15-year-old girls in 1976. When Betsy visits Arlene at the Watergate Motel, the two accidentally stumble into the middle of the infamous Watergate robbery. In order to keep them quiet, Nixon (Dan Hedaya) appoints them as honorary dog walkers. As they travel in and out of the White House, their seemingly innocent actions start a chain of events that may eventually lead to Nixon's resignation as president of the United States.

programme.title: Swiss Army Man
programme.desc: Being stranded on a deserted island leaves young Hank (Paul Dano) bored, lonely and without hope. As a rope hangs around his neck, Hank prepares to end it all, until he suddenly spots a man (Daniel Radcliffe) laying by the shore. Unfortunately, he is dead and quite flatulent. Using the gassy body to his advantage, Hank miraculously makes it back to the mainland. However, he now finds himself lost in the wilderness, and dragging the talking corpse named Manny along for the adventure.

programme.title: Can't Hardly Wait
programme.desc: School's out, and an entire graduating class -- from football stars and cool girls to complete nerds -- gathers at a wealthy classmate's home for a party. There, the artistic Preston (Ethan Embry) hopes to move in on Amanda (Jennifer Love Hewitt), the beauty he has admired from afar for years. Dorky William (Charlie Korsmo) schemes to pay back meathead Mike (Peter Facinelli) for years of bullying, and would-be rapper Kenny (Seth Green) gets locked in a room with snarky Denise (Lauren Ambrose).

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: Stacy Hamilton (Jennifer Jason Leigh) is a pretty, but inexperienced, teen interested in dating. Given advice by her uninhibited friend, Linda Barrett (Phoebe Cates), Stacy gets trapped in a love triangle with nice guy Mark Ratner (Brian Backer) and his more assured buddy Mike Damone (Robert Romanus). Meanwhile, Stacy's classmate Jeff Spicoli (Sean Penn), who lives for surfing and being stoned, faces off against Mr. Hand (Ray Walston), a strict teacher who has no time for the slacker's antics.

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Josh (Breckin Meyer) videotapes his affair with another girl and accidentally mails it to his girlfriend. Discovering the mistake, he tows two of his college buddies -- and one not-so-eager kid who happens to own the car -- on a raucous 1,800-mile road trip from Ithaca, N.Y., to Austin, Texas, to save his lifelong romance.

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: For an awkward, self-conscious girl like Kiki (Julia Roberts), being the personal assistant to a beautiful megastar like Gwen (Catherine Zeta-Jones) isn't easy. But when she dutifully accepts the task of helping Gwen and her estranged husband Eddie (John Cusack) make it through one last public appearance masterminded by legendary press agent Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal), forever devoted Kiki finds that her job is about to get even harder when her and Eddie's relationship takes a romantic turn.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, Sam Baldwin (Tom Hanks) moves to Seattle with his son, Jonah (Ross Mallinger). When Jonah calls in to a talk-radio program to find a new wife for his father, Sam grudgingly gets on the line to discuss his feelings. Annie Reed (Meg Ryan), a reporter in Baltimore, hears Sam speak and falls for him, even though she is engaged. Unsure where it will lead, she writes Sam a letter asking him to meet her at the Empire State Building on Valentine's Day.

programme.title: Belushi
programme.desc: Jim Belushi, Chevy Chase, Dan Aykroyd and others discuss the extraordinary life and career of beloved actor and comedian John Belushi.

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: Stacy Hamilton (Jennifer Jason Leigh) is a pretty, but inexperienced, teen interested in dating. Given advice by her uninhibited friend, Linda Barrett (Phoebe Cates), Stacy gets trapped in a love triangle with nice guy Mark Ratner (Brian Backer) and his more assured buddy Mike Damone (Robert Romanus). Meanwhile, Stacy's classmate Jeff Spicoli (Sean Penn), who lives for surfing and being stoned, faces off against Mr. Hand (Ray Walston), a strict teacher who has no time for the slacker's antics.

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Josh (Breckin Meyer) videotapes his affair with another girl and accidentally mails it to his girlfriend. Discovering the mistake, he tows two of his college buddies -- and one not-so-eager kid who happens to own the car -- on a raucous 1,800-mile road trip from Ithaca, N.Y., to Austin, Texas, to save his lifelong romance.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: In 1931, the Bondurant brothers of Franklin County, Va., run a multipurpose backwoods establishment that hides their true business, bootlegging. Middle brother Forrest (Tom Hardy) is the brain of the operation; older Howard (Jason Clarke) is the brawn, and younger Jack (Shia LaBeouf), the lookout. Though the local police have taken bribes and left the brothers alone, a violent war erupts when a sadistic lawman (Guy Pearce) from Chicago arrives and tries to shut down the Bondurants operation.

programme.title: All Access
programme.desc: The lives of boxers.

programme.title: The Queens of Comedy
programme.desc: Starting where "The Kings of Comedy" left off, this stand-up performance offers a night of comedy from a distinctively female perspective. Recorded live at the Orpheum Theatre in Memphis, Tenn., "The Queens of Comedy" features comedians Mo'Nique, Adele Givens, Sommore and Laura Hayes sharing their uncensored views on life, men and sex. Laura Hayes opens up the show with anecdotes about her crazy family, and Mo'Nique brings down the house with a raunchy closing act.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: Based on the popular spy series, this film follows suave international thief Simon Templar (Val Kilmer), who is contracted by Russian oil magnate Ivan Tretiak (Rade Serbedzija) to steal a formula for cold fusion. So Templar, nicknamed "The Saint" because of his use of Roman Catholic saints as aliases, finds scientist Dr. Emma Russell (Elisabeth Shue), seduces her and steals the information. However, because the formula was incomplete, Tretiak now wants to kill Templar and kidnap Russell.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Illegal boxing promoter Turkish (Jason Statham) convinces gangster Brick Top (Alan Ford) to offer bets on bare-knuckle boxer Mickey (Brad Pitt) at his bookie business. When Mickey does not throw his first fight as agreed, an infuriated Brick Top demands another match. Meanwhile, gangster Frankie Four Fingers (Benicio Del Toro) comes to place a bet for a friend with Brick Top's bookies, as multiple criminals converge on a stolen diamond that Frankie has come to London to sell.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Dreamland
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: Vietnam veteran and drifter John J. Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) wanders into a small Washington town in search of an old friend, but is met with intolerance and brutality by the local sheriff, Will Teasle (Brian Dennehy). When Teasle and his deputies restrain and shave Rambo, he flashes back to his time as a prisoner of war and unleashes his fury on the officers. He narrowly escapes the manhunt, but it will take his former commander (Richard Crenna) to save the hunters from the hunted.

programme.title: Killer Elite
programme.desc: Danny Bryce (Jason Statham), one of the world's deadliest special-ops agents, returns from self-imposed exile after his mentor, Hunter (Robert De Niro) is captured. Danny reassembles his former team of skilled commandos to launch a rescue mission, and also to infiltrate the highly feared military unit, the British Special Air Service. The mission will not be easy, for Danny and his team must cut their way through Spike (Clive Owen) and a team of assassins known as the Feather Men.

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Chris (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), a star athlete, has the world at his feet. Then a devastating car accident leaves him with brain damage and his bright future dimmed. He takes a job as a bank janitor and must write everything down in a small notepad in order to remember. Some former schoolmates lure Chris into their inner circle and rope him into helping them carry out a heist at the bank.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Disgraced pro football quarterback Paul Crewe (Adam Sandler) lands in jail, where manipulative Warden Hazen (James Cromwell) recruits him to advise the institution's team. This turns into a lead role quarterbacking a crew of inmates in a game against a team of prison guards. Aided by incarcerated ex-NFL coach Nate Scarborough (Burt Reynolds), Crewe and his team must overcome not only the bloodthirstiness of the opposition, but also the corrupt officials trying to fix the game against them.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Harding's life and legacy now becomes instantly tarnished as she's forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: Actors (Tom Hanks, Halle Berry, Jim Broadbent) take on multiple roles in an epic that spans five centuries. An attorney harbors a fleeing slave on a voyage from the Pacific Islands in 1849; a poor composer in pre-World War II Britain struggles to finish his magnum opus before a past act catches up with him; a genetically engineered worker in 2144 feels the forbidden stirring of human consciousness -- and so on. As souls are born and reborn, they renew their bonds to one another throughout time.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Eric Bana ("Black Hawk Down") stars as scientist Bruce Banner, whose inner demons transform him in the aftermath of a catastrophic experiment; Jennifer Connelly portrays Betty Ross, whose scientific genius unwittingly helps unleash the Hulk; Nick Nolte plays Banner's brilliant father, who passes on a tragic legacy to his son; and Sam Elliott portrays the commander of a top-secret military research center.

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: For Micky Ward (Mark Wahlberg), boxing is a family affair. His tough-as-nails mother is his manager. His half-brother, Dicky (Christian Bale), once a promising boxer himself, is his very unreliable trainer. Despite Micky's hard work, he is losing and, when the latest fight nearly kills him, he follows his girlfriend's advice and splits from the family. Then Micky becomes a contender for the world title and he -- and his family -- earns a shot at redemption.

programme.title: Black Monday
programme.desc: Mo makes his first discovery as a jazz producer; Dawn's still serving time for masterminding Black Monday; Blair learns the hard way how to play politics; Keith discovers that the late Lenny Leighman has some big follicles to fill.

programme.desc: Keith thinks he's the business-wiz; Tiff and Corkie need to rebrand and refinance Pfaffashions; Dawn and Mo negotiate their new work-life balance; Blair has a near-death sexperience and makes a new frienemesis.

programme.desc: Dawn puts on a show for her parole officer; Blair puts on a show for the RNC; Mo makes a big personal announcement; Keith tries to please Larry; Blair shoots for political points.

programme.desc: Zayna deals with a rumor while Kevin deals with delivering on his first freelance painting job; Dan prepares to attend Jess's birthday party.

programme.desc: When Kevin and Dan's jazz musician neighbor faces eviction, Kevin enlists Jasmine to organize a protest; Dan anxiously dreads an after-school meeting with Jess to discuss a case in which he expects to be fired for his ties to Drew and Zayna.

programme.title: Flatbush Misdemeanors
programme.desc: Kevin spends a 'shrooms-filled night out with his successful sister which leads to a series of revelations; in an effort to make Dan bond with his stepdad, Dan's mom drags him into competing in the Greenest Block in Brooklyn contest.

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: Kiesha wrestles with a decision that will affect the life of her unborn child; a run-in with police leaves Kevin, Jake and Papa reeling; Douda tries to walk the line between gangster and mayor; Tiff and Dom go into business together.

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: Emmett comes clean to Tiff; a college tour forces Kevin and Jake to consider their futures; Douda makes a decision that will change the face of Chicago; Jada gets some unexpected news; Papa starts a podcast; Trig reunites with an old friend.

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: Tiff discovers a possible solution to her relationship woes with Emmett; Douda, Tracy and Trig take community protection into their own hands; Kevin and Jemma hit a rough patch.

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: Jake, Jemma and Kevin organize an on-campus protest; Emmett and Tiff set new boundaries for their relationship; Imani schemes to break a girl out of the 63rd St. Mob's trap house; Nina is suspicious of Dre; Jada gives Emmett some unexpected news.

programme.title: Ziwe
programme.desc: Ziwe investigates whitewashing in Hollywood with guest Adam Pally and showcases the trailer for her biopic; musical guest: Ziwe.

programme.title: Set It Off
programme.desc: After being fired from her job as a bank teller, Frankie (Vivica A. Fox) begins working at a janitorial service with her friends Tisean (Kimberly Elise), a single mother; Cleo (Queen Latifah), a boisterous lesbian; and Stony (Jada Pinkett), who is dealing with the recent death of her brother. The women are struggling with their finances, so they decide to start robbing banks. At first the group is successful, but they soon attract the attention of an obsessive detective (John C. McGinley).

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Movie to be announced.

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: One of the most profitable horror movies ever made, this tale of an exorcism is based loosely on actual events. When young Regan (Linda Blair) starts acting odd -- levitating, speaking in tongues -- her worried mother (Ellen Burstyn) seeks medical help, only to hit a dead end. A local priest (Jason Miller), however, thinks the girl may be seized by the devil. The priest makes a request to perform an exorcism, and the church sends in an expert (Max von Sydow) to help with the difficult job.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: For Dan Gallagher (Michael Douglas), life is good. He is on the rise at his New York law firm, is happily married to his wife, Beth (Anne Archer), and has a loving daughter. But, after a casual fling with a sultry book editor named Alex (Glenn Close), everything changes. Jilted by Dan, Alex becomes unstable, her behavior escalating from aggressive pursuit to obsessive stalking. Dan realizes that his main problem is not hiding his affair, but rather saving himself and his family.

programme.title: Career Opportunities
programme.desc: When night-shift custodian Jim (Frank Whaley) is accidentally locked up alone in the store he cleans, he realizes he has access to the entire building and decides to indulge in the abundance of free food and merchandise at his fingertips. Surprisingly, he bumps into local rich girl Josie (Jennifer Connelly), who is also imprisoned in the store for the night, and they quickly bond. But, just as romantic sparks fly, Josie and Jim are interrupted by two small-time robbers.

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful
programme.desc: Keith Nelson (Eric Stoltz), an artsy high school outcast, tries to land a date with popular girl Amanda Jones (Lea Thompson) with some help from his tomboy best friend, Watts (Mary Stuart Masterson). However, his advances draw the ire of Amanda's snobby ex-boyfriend, Hardy Jenns (Craig Sheffer), who makes plans to get even. Matters are further complicated when Watts realizes she likes Keith as more than just a friend and tries to convince him to stop pursuing Amanda.

programme.title: Moonrise Kingdom
programme.desc: The year is 1965, and the residents of New Penzance, an island off the coast of New England, inhabit a community that seems untouched by some of the bad things going on in the rest of the world. Twelve-year-olds Sam (Jared Gilman) and Suzy (Kara Hayward) have fallen in love and decide to run away. But a violent storm is approaching the island, forcing a group of quirky adults (Bruce Willis, Edward Norton, Bill Murray) to mobilize a search party and find the youths before calamity strikes.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Eric Bana ("Black Hawk Down") stars as scientist Bruce Banner, whose inner demons transform him in the aftermath of a catastrophic experiment; Jennifer Connelly portrays Betty Ross, whose scientific genius unwittingly helps unleash the Hulk; Nick Nolte plays Banner's brilliant father, who passes on a tragic legacy to his son; and Sam Elliott portrays the commander of a top-secret military research center.

programme.title: First Blood
programme.desc: Vietnam veteran and drifter John J. Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) wanders into a small Washington town in search of an old friend, but is met with intolerance and brutality by the local sheriff, Will Teasle (Brian Dennehy). When Teasle and his deputies restrain and shave Rambo, he flashes back to his time as a prisoner of war and unleashes his fury on the officers. He narrowly escapes the manhunt, but it will take his former commander (Richard Crenna) to save the hunters from the hunted.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo (Sylvester Stallone) is doing hard time in jail when his former boss, Col. Troutman (Richard Crenna), offers him a deal. If Rambo travels to Vietnam to try to find the American prisoners of war, his criminal record will be expunged. Rambo takes the reconnaissance assignment and agrees not to get involved in any of the action. However, when his Vietnamese lover, Co Bao (Julia Nickson), is killed by American forces, Rambo forgets his promise and takes matters into his own hands.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Disgraced pro football quarterback Paul Crewe (Adam Sandler) lands in jail, where manipulative Warden Hazen (James Cromwell) recruits him to advise the institution's team. This turns into a lead role quarterbacking a crew of inmates in a game against a team of prison guards. Aided by incarcerated ex-NFL coach Nate Scarborough (Burt Reynolds), Crewe and his team must overcome not only the bloodthirstiness of the opposition, but also the corrupt officials trying to fix the game against them.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Harding's life and legacy now becomes instantly tarnished as she's forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Despite warnings to stick to the Appalachian Trail, hikers stray off course and cross into land inhabited by a hidden community of mountain dwellers who use deadly means to protect their way of life. Suddenly under siege, the friends seem headed to the point of no return -- unless one man can reach them in time.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Commodus (Joaquin Phoenix) takes power and strips rank from Maximus (Russell Crowe), one of the favored generals of his predecessor and father, Emperor Marcus Aurelius, the great stoical philosopher. Maximus is then relegated to fighting to the death in the gladiator arenas.

programme.title: Winter's Bone
programme.desc: Faced with an unresponsive mother and a criminal father, Ozark teenager Ree Dolly (Jennifer Lawrence) does what she can to manage the household and take care of her two younger siblings. Informed by the sheriff (Garret Dillahunt) that their father put their home up for bond and then disappeared, Ree sets out on a dangerous quest to find him. Her entire family's fate now in her hands, Ree challenges her outlaw kin's code of silence and risks her life to learn her father's fate.

programme.title: Becky
programme.desc: Spunky and rebellious Becky tries to reconnect with her father during a weekend getaway at a lakefront house. But the trip soon takes a turn for the worse when convicts on the run, led by the merciless Dominick, suddenly invade the home.

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Josh (Breckin Meyer) videotapes his affair with another girl and accidentally mails it to his girlfriend. Discovering the mistake, he tows two of his college buddies -- and one not-so-eager kid who happens to own the car -- on a raucous 1,800-mile road trip from Ithaca, N.Y., to Austin, Texas, to save his lifelong romance.

programme.title: Devil in a Blue Dress
programme.desc: In late 1940s Los Angeles, Easy Rawlins (Denzel Washington) is an unemployed black World War II veteran with few job prospects. At a bar, Easy meets DeWitt Albright (Tom Sizemore), a mysterious white man looking for someone to investigate the disappearance of a missing white woman named Daphne Monet (Jennifer Beals), who he suspects is hiding out in one of the city's black jazz clubs. Strapped for money and facing house payments, Easy takes the job, but soon finds himself in over his head.

programme.title: Dreamland
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Repairmen Val McKee (Kevin Bacon) and Earl Bassett (Fred Ward) are tired of their dull lives in the small desert town of Perfection, Nev. But just as the two try to skip town, they happen upon a series of mysterious deaths and a concerned seismologist (Finn Carter) studying unnatural readings below the ground. With the help of an eccentric couple (Reba McEntire, Michael Gross), the group fights for survival against giant, worm-like monsters hungry for human flesh.

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: Kate Mandell takes a job as a nanny for two young orphans at an isolated Gothic mansion in the Maine countryside. She soon learns that the children -- Miles and Flora -- are emotionally distant and unstable. When strange events start to plague Kate and the siblings, she begins to suspect that the estate's dark corridors are home to a malevolent entity.

programme.title: The Last Exorcism Part II
programme.desc: Found terrified and alone in rural Louisiana, Nell Sweetzer (Ashley Bell) is now safely in New Orleans. She can't remember the terrible events of the previous months, only that she is the only surviving member of her family. Nell wants to start a new life for herself, but just as she begins the difficult process, the evil force that once possessed her returns -- bringing with it unimaginably horrific plans that mean her last exorcism was just the beginning.

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Redford stars as CIA operative Nathan Muir, who is on the brink of retirement from the field, when he learns his protégé Tom Bishop has been arrested in China on a charge of espionage. No stranger to the machinations of the CIA's top echelon, Muir hones all his skills and irreverent manner in order to find a way to free Bishop.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Dreamland
programme.desc: A teen bounty hunter is torn between helping or capturing a seductive fugitive bank robber hiding in his small town during the Great Depression.

programme.title: Sacrifice
programme.desc: A New Yorker and his pregnant wife return to the Norwegian village of his birth to claim an unexpected inheritance. They soon find themselves in a living nightmare when they encounter a sinister cult that worships a sea-dwelling deity.

programme.title: Django Unchained
programme.desc: Two years before the Civil War, Django (Jamie Foxx), a slave, finds himself accompanying an unorthodox German bounty hunter named Dr. King Schultz (Christoph Waltz) on a mission to capture the vicious Brittle brothers. Their mission successful, Schultz frees Django, and together they hunt the South's most-wanted criminals. Their travels take them to the infamous plantation of shady Calvin Candie (Leonardo DiCaprio), where Django's long-lost wife (Kerry Washington) is still a slave.

programme.title: Moonlight
programme.desc: A look at three defining chapters in the life of Chiron, a young black man growing up in Miami. His epic journey to manhood is guided by the kindness, support and love of the community that helps raise him.

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: The Comedy Vaccine
programme.desc: The comic performs his fifth stand-up comedy special in Tempe, Ariz., focusing on COVID-19 and offering his views on mask culture, fatherhood and why 2020 was the best year to fart in public.

programme.title: Brimstone
programme.desc: A frontier woman turns fugitive when she is wrongly accused of a crime she didn't commit and is hunted by a vengeful preacher.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Illegal boxing promoter Turkish (Jason Statham) convinces gangster Brick Top (Alan Ford) to offer bets on bare-knuckle boxer Mickey (Brad Pitt) at his bookie business. When Mickey does not throw his first fight as agreed, an infuriated Brick Top demands another match. Meanwhile, gangster Frankie Four Fingers (Benicio Del Toro) comes to place a bet for a friend with Brick Top's bookies, as multiple criminals converge on a stolen diamond that Frankie has come to London to sell.

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: A rush-hour fender-bender on New York City's crowded FDR Drive, under most circumstances, wouldn't set off a chain reaction that could decimate two people's lives. But on this day, at this time, a minor collision will turn two complete strangers into vicious adversaries. Their means of destroying each other might be different, but their goals, ultimately, will be the same: Each will systematically try to dismantle the other's life in a reckless effort to reclaim something he has lost.

programme.title: Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: Eight married friends take their annual reunion vacation in the Colorado mountains. Revelations of infidelity involving one pair shatter the amicable mood, forcing the remaining friends to take a hard look at the strength of their own marriages. The couples grapple with issues of commitment, love, betrayal and forgiveness as they try to move on with their lives.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris (Queen Latifah) has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter (Paige Hurd) and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge (Kevin Bacon), Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn (Alicia Silverstone) and Terri (Andie MacDowell), respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: After losing his job and wife, and spending time in a mental institution, Pat Solatano (Bradley Cooper) winds up living with his parents (Robert De Niro, Jacki Weaver). He wants to rebuild his life and reunite with his wife, but his parents would be happy if he just shared their obsession with the Philadelphia Eagles. Things get complicated when Pat meets Tiffany (Jennifer Lawrence), who offers to help him reconnect with his wife, if he will do something very important for her in exchange.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two women, one (Cameron Diaz) from America and one (Kate Winslet) from Britain, swap homes at Christmastime after bad breakups with their boyfriends. Each woman finds romance with a local man (Jude Law, Jack Black) but realizes that the imminent return home may end the relationship.

programme.title: Why Did I Get Married?
programme.desc: Eight married friends take their annual reunion vacation in the Colorado mountains. Revelations of infidelity involving one pair shatter the amicable mood, forcing the remaining friends to take a hard look at the strength of their own marriages. The couples grapple with issues of commitment, love, betrayal and forgiveness as they try to move on with their lives.

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: For Micky Ward (Mark Wahlberg), boxing is a family affair. His tough-as-nails mother is his manager. His half-brother, Dicky (Christian Bale), once a promising boxer himself, is his very unreliable trainer. Despite Micky's hard work, he is losing and, when the latest fight nearly kills him, he follows his girlfriend's advice and splits from the family. Then Micky becomes a contender for the world title and he -- and his family -- earns a shot at redemption.

programme.title: Black Monday
programme.desc: Mo tries to keep up with Nomi, but he comes to realize that he can't party like he used to; Dawn's attempt to get him to slow down backfires; Pastor Newell's funeral planning goes off the rails and ends with a bang.

programme.title: Flatbush Misdemeanors
programme.desc: Kevin spends a 'shrooms-filled night out with his successful sister which leads to a series of revelations; in an effort to make Dan bond with his stepdad, Dan's mom drags him into competing in the Greenest Block in Brooklyn contest.

programme.title: The Chi
programme.desc: Jake, Jemma and Kevin organize an on-campus protest; Emmett and Tiff set new boundaries for their relationship; Imani schemes to break a girl out of the 63rd St. Mob's trap house; Nina is suspicious of Dre; Jada gives Emmett some unexpected news.

programme.title: The Kings
programme.desc: Gentle giant Tommy Hearns represents Detroit's hopes and dreams; in the aftermath of the presidential election, Ray Leonard challenges Roberto Duran; Marvin Hagler is given a second chance at glory.

programme.title: Ziwe
programme.desc: Ziwe investigates whitewashing in Hollywood with guest Adam Pally and showcases the trailer for her biopic; musical guest: Ziwe.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: In 1931, the Bondurant brothers of Franklin County, Va., run a multipurpose backwoods establishment that hides their true business, bootlegging. Middle brother Forrest (Tom Hardy) is the brain of the operation; older Howard (Jason Clarke) is the brawn, and younger Jack (Shia LaBeouf), the lookout. Though the local police have taken bribes and left the brothers alone, a violent war erupts when a sadistic lawman (Guy Pearce) from Chicago arrives and tries to shut down the Bondurants operation.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly
programme.desc: When rival crook Johnny Amato (Vincent Curatola) hatches a plan to rob a card game run by mob lackey Markie (Ray Liotta), he picks a low-rent thug named Frankie (Scoot McNairy) to do the job. Frankie picks a less-than-ideal partner (Ben Mendelsohn) to help him, but despite their combined incompetence, they manage to make off with the mob's money. In retaliation, Markie's bosses hire Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt), a mob enforcer, to eradicate those responsible.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris (Queen Latifah) has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter (Paige Hurd) and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge (Kevin Bacon), Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn (Alicia Silverstone) and Terri (Andie MacDowell), respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Disgraced pro football quarterback Paul Crewe (Adam Sandler) lands in jail, where manipulative Warden Hazen (James Cromwell) recruits him to advise the institution's team. This turns into a lead role quarterbacking a crew of inmates in a game against a team of prison guards. Aided by incarcerated ex-NFL coach Nate Scarborough (Burt Reynolds), Crewe and his team must overcome not only the bloodthirstiness of the opposition, but also the corrupt officials trying to fix the game against them.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Eric Bana ("Black Hawk Down") stars as scientist Bruce Banner, whose inner demons transform him in the aftermath of a catastrophic experiment; Jennifer Connelly portrays Betty Ross, whose scientific genius unwittingly helps unleash the Hulk; Nick Nolte plays Banner's brilliant father, who passes on a tragic legacy to his son; and Sam Elliott portrays the commander of a top-secret military research center.

programme.title: A Call to Spy
programme.desc: At the dawn of World War II, a desperate Winston Churchill orders his new spy agency to train women for covert operations. Together, these female agents help undermine the Nazi regime in France, leaving an unmistakable legacy in their wake.

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: In 1963, rodeo cowboy Jack Twist (Jake Gyllenhaal) and ranch hand Ennis Del Mar (Heath Ledger) are hired by rancher Joe Aguirre (Randy Quaid) as sheep herders in Wyoming. One night on Brokeback Mountain, Jack makes a drunken pass at Ennis that is eventually reciprocated. Though Ennis marries his longtime sweetheart, Alma (Michelle Williams), and Jack marries a fellow rodeo rider (Anne Hathaway), the two men keep up their tortured and sporadic affair over the course of 20 years.

programme.title: Ziwe
programme.desc: Ziwe investigates whitewashing in Hollywood with guest Adam Pally and showcases the trailer for her biopic; musical guest: Ziwe.

programme.title: Black Monday
programme.desc: Mo tries to keep up with Nomi, but he comes to realize that he can't party like he used to; Dawn's attempt to get him to slow down backfires; Pastor Newell's funeral planning goes off the rails and ends with a bang.

programme.title: Flatbush Misdemeanors
programme.desc: Kevin spends a 'shrooms-filled night out with his successful sister which leads to a series of revelations; in an effort to make Dan bond with his stepdad, Dan's mom drags him into competing in the Greenest Block in Brooklyn contest.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross (Laura Linney) is sent by her father-in-law, mogul R.B. Travis (Joe Don Baker), to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly (Ernie Hudson), Ross and a mismatched search party -- including primatologist Dr. Peter Elliot (Dylan Walsh), treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka (Tim Curry) and a gorilla -- discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Commodus (Joaquin Phoenix) takes power and strips rank from Maximus (Russell Crowe), one of the favored generals of his predecessor and father, Emperor Marcus Aurelius, the great stoical philosopher. Maximus is then relegated to fighting to the death in the gladiator arenas.

programme.title: Los federales
programme.desc: El agente Mark Sheridan es arrestado por un presunto asesinato. Es trasladado en avión, pero se realiza un aterrizaje de emergencia en el río Ohio y Sheridan se escapa. El oficial federal Sam Gerard y su equipo inician la búsqueda del fugitivo.

programme.title: Pasajero 57
programme.desc: Un experto en seguridad de aviones lucha contra unos secuestradores que tomaron el control del avión en que viaja.

programme.title: 12 horas para sobrevivir
programme.desc: Durante una noche de caos sancionada por el gobierno, la misión de un hombre para vengar a su hijo muerto se transforma en una búsqueda para proteger a unos desconocidos de unos asaltantes violentos.

programme.title: El destino final 4
programme.desc: Un grupo de amigos acude a un circuito de carreras. Durante la competencia, Nick tiene una premonición sobre un accidente y saca a sus amigos del recinto para escapar de la tragedia. El accidente acaba ocurriendo y todos celebran el hecho de estar vivos. Sin embargo, el grupo no ha vencido del todo a la muerte, que volverá para llevarse a los supervivientes de la manera más brutal posible.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: Adolescentes despiertan involuntariamente a una oscura fuerza poderosa cuando ellos usan un tablero de Ouija para intentar comunicarse con un amigo que murió recientemente.

programme.title: El ataque del tiburón de seis cabezas
programme.desc: Un tiburón de seis cabezas amenaza las vidas de los asistentes a un campamento matrimonial que se está desarrollando en una isla remota.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Entrevistas con celebridades.

programme.title: Golpe bajo: El juego final
programme.desc: En una cárcel de Texas, veteranos de la NFL entrenan a sus compañeros para un juego contra los guardias del penal.

programme.title: Dante's Peak: La furia de la montaña
programme.desc: Harry Dalton, un prestigioso vulcanólogo, detecta una peligrosa actividad sísmica y avisa de una posible erupción en las cercanías de Dante's Peak, un tranquilo pueblo que está coronado por un inmenso volcán apagado.

programme.title: SPL 2: Tiempo de consecuencias
programme.desc: Un policía encubierto intenta encontrar al autor intelectual de un sindicato de drogas. Cuando él es identificado, termina en una prisión tailandesa. Sorprendentemente, es es un donante compatible de médula ósea para la hija de un guardia.

programme.title: El fugitivo
programme.desc: La vida del doctor Richard Kimble, un reputado cirujano de Chicago, se desmorona cuando su mujer es brutalmente asesinada por un misterioso hombre y él es acusado del crimen.

programme.title: Los federales
programme.desc: El agente Mark Sheridan es arrestado por un presunto asesinato. Es trasladado en avión, pero se realiza un aterrizaje de emergencia en el río Ohio y Sheridan se escapa. El oficial federal Sam Gerard y su equipo inician la búsqueda del fugitivo.

programme.title: Drácula: La historia jamás contada
programme.desc: La historia de Vlad Tepes, el príncipe rumano que se convirtió en el vampiro más famoso de todos los tiempos. La película narra la trágica vida de Vlad, qué dilemas tuvo que afrontar y cómo se convirtió en un vampiro.

programme.title: Pasajero 57
programme.desc: Un experto en seguridad de aviones lucha contra unos secuestradores que tomaron el control del avión en que viaja.

programme.title: Sniper: El legado
programme.desc: Después que varios líderes militares son asesinados, Brandon sigue la pista de los asesinos ante la noticia que su padre también podría estar entre las víctimas.

programme.title: La prisión
programme.desc: Tras un accidente de tránsito, un expolicía va a la cárcel. Allí descubre que la prisión es controlada por los reclusos con ayuda de los carceleros, un escondite perfecto para planear y cometer los más osados crímenes.

programme.title: Lucha Libre AAA
programme.desc: Lo mejor de la lucha libre profesional en México, con una plataforma moderna, innovadora y sensacional.

programme.title: Juego sucio en Las Vegas
programme.desc: Un jugador es introducido a una vida de dinero y poder, pero rápidamente se da cuenta que es parte de una organización que podría costarle su vida.

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy, una joven que ejerce de "mula" para unos narcotraficantes, adquiere poderes sobrenaturales tras romperse una de las bolsas de droga que transporta y absorber los estupefacientes.

programme.title: Punto límite
programme.desc: Un agente del FBI trabaja encubierto en una banda de surfistas sospechosos de asaltar bancos portando máscaras de expresidentes. Sin embargo, el trabajo lo lleva a formar una amistad con el líder de la banda.

programme.title: SPL 2: Tiempo de consecuencias
programme.desc: Un policía encubierto intenta encontrar al autor intelectual de un sindicato de drogas. Cuando él es identificado, termina en una prisión tailandesa. Sorprendentemente, es es un donante compatible de médula ósea para la hija de un guardia.

programme.title: Detrás de las paredes
programme.desc: El publicista Will Atenton deja un lucrativo trabajo en Nueva York para mudarse con su esposa, Libby, y sus hijas a una pintoresca ciudad de Nueva Inglaterra. Sin embargo, mientras se adaptan a su casa, los Atenton descubren que una mujer y sus hijas fueron asesinadas ahí, y el marido sobreviviente es el principal sospechoso. Con la ayuda de una vecina, quien era cercana a la familia asesinada, Will une una terrible cadena de eventos.

programme.title: Drácula: La historia jamás contada
programme.desc: La historia de Vlad Tepes, el príncipe rumano que se convirtió en el vampiro más famoso de todos los tiempos. La película narra la trágica vida de Vlad, qué dilemas tuvo que afrontar y cómo se convirtió en un vampiro.

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: El aprendiz de vampiro
programme.desc: Tras conocer a un hombre misterioso en un espectáculo de fenómenos, Darren debe abandonar su vida normal y convertirse en vampiro.

programme.title: Sniper: El legado
programme.desc: Después que varios líderes militares son asesinados, Brandon sigue la pista de los asesinos ante la noticia que su padre también podría estar entre las víctimas.

programme.title: El chacal
programme.desc: Un francotirador del IRA encarcelado pacta con el FBI: quedará libre si ayuda a prevenir que un asesino brutal, y aparentemente sin rostro, complete su próximo trabajo.

programme.title: Romeo debe morir
programme.desc: Han quiere vengar la muerte de su hermano, miembro de una pandilla asiática que le disputaba el control del puerto de Oakland a los gánsters afroamericanos. Pero todo se complica cuando conoce a Trish, dado que ambos pertenecen a bandos opuestos.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Dynamite
programme.desc: Young Bucks contra Pac/Penta El Zero Miedo. Jungle Boy/Christian Cage vs. Private Party. Nick Comoroto vs. Dustin Rhodes. Cody Rhodes/Lee Johnson vs. QT Marshall/Anthony Ogogo. La Dra. Britt Baker celebra su victoria por el título femenino de la AEW.

programme.title: Juego sucio en Las Vegas
programme.desc: Un jugador es introducido a una vida de dinero y poder, pero rápidamente se da cuenta que es parte de una organización que podría costarle su vida.

programme.title: Alerta en lo profundo 2
programme.desc: Un conservacionista de tiburones es contratado para trabajar en un proyecto secreto que modifica genéticamente esos animales.

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy, una joven que ejerce de "mula" para unos narcotraficantes, adquiere poderes sobrenaturales tras romperse una de las bolsas de droga que transporta y absorber los estupefacientes.

programme.title: La noche del demonio: Capítulo 3
programme.desc: La psíquica Elise Rainier acepta a regañadientes utilizar su capacidad de contacto con los muertos, con el fin de ayudar a una adolescente que se ha convertido en blanco de una peligrosa entidad sobrenatural.

programme.title: Rec 2
programme.desc: Un grupo de policías entra en el edificio maldito, acompañado por un doctor que va a extraer sangre de los infectados para encontrar una cura. A su vez, tres adolescentes, un bombero y un antiguo inquilino entran por el alcantarillado.

programme.title: Borning: Rápido y peligroso
programme.desc: Un aficionado a los autos se prepara para competir en su Mustang amarillo en una carrera ilegal que recorre el país. Sin embargo, su hija adolescente llega inesperadamente para pasar sus vacaciones con él.

programme.title: Detrás de las paredes
programme.desc: El publicista Will Atenton deja un lucrativo trabajo en Nueva York para mudarse con su esposa, Libby, y sus hijas a una pintoresca ciudad de Nueva Inglaterra. Sin embargo, mientras se adaptan a su casa, los Atenton descubren que una mujer y sus hijas fueron asesinadas ahí, y el marido sobreviviente es el principal sospechoso. Con la ayuda de una vecina, quien era cercana a la familia asesinada, Will une una terrible cadena de eventos.

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: El aprendiz de vampiro
programme.desc: Tras conocer a un hombre misterioso en un espectáculo de fenómenos, Darren debe abandonar su vida normal y convertirse en vampiro.

programme.title: El chacal
programme.desc: Un francotirador del IRA encarcelado pacta con el FBI: quedará libre si ayuda a prevenir que un asesino brutal, y aparentemente sin rostro, complete su próximo trabajo.

programme.title: Romeo debe morir

programme.desc: Un experto en computadoras descubre que su mundo es una simulación total creada con maliciosas intenciones por parte de la ciberinteligencia.

programme.title: Matrix recargado
programme.desc: Unos luchadores por la libertad usan habilidades extraordinarias y armas para enfrentarse a las máquinas.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Un cazador de serpientes dirige a un equipo documentalista por la selva brasileña, pero los conduce a las fauces de una boa monstruosa.

programme.title: Alerta en lo profundo 2
programme.desc: Un conservacionista de tiburones es contratado para trabajar en un proyecto secreto que modifica genéticamente esos animales.
