programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: Deirdre (Natascha McElhone) puts together a team of experts that she tasks with stealing a valuable briefcase, the contents of which are a mystery. The international team includes Sam (Robert De Niro), an ex-intelligence officer, along with Vincent (Jean Reno), Gregor (Stellan Skarsgard) and others. As their operation gets underway, several team members are found to be untrustworthy, and everyone must complete the mission with a watchful eye on everyone else.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a notorious narcotics kingpin critically wounds Crockett (Don Johnson) during a drug bust. With appearances by William Russ and Glenn Frey.

programme.title: Knight Rider
programme.desc: A dying millionaire (Richard Basehart) rescues a badly wounded undercover police officer and gives him a new identity.

programme.title: Sin
programme.desc: A retired policeman (Ving Rhames) searches for his missing sister (Kerry Washington) and becomes the target of a mysterious criminal (Gary Oldman).

programme.title: Tears of the Sun
programme.desc: The Nigerian government has fallen, and the country is on the verge of civil war. Lt. A.K. Waters (Bruce Willis) has been assigned to lead a team of soldiers into the Nigerian jungle to rescue Dr. Lena Kendricks (Monica Bellucci). When Waters and his team locate Kendricks, she tells them she won't leave her helpless patients to be slaughtered by rebels. The team incurs the wrath of both U.S. and Nigerian forces when they side with Kendricks and attempt to march the refugees to safety.

programme.title: Ronin

programme.title: Knight Rider
programme.desc: Michael helps a trucker charged with murder and foils a transportation boss threatening independent drivers.

programme.title: Eye of the Beholder
programme.desc: British spy Steve Wilson (Ewan McGregor), known as "The Eye" to his employers, is trailing Paul Hugo (Steven McCarthy) for an assignment when he witnesses Paul being murdered by his girlfriend, Joanna Eris (Ashley Judd). Haunted by the breakup of his marriage and by his absent daughter, Lucy (Ann-Marie Brown), Steve notices Joanna's resemblance to his child and decides to protect her. As Joanna wanders the United States, Steve follows and destroys evidence of her multiple killings.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Following the death of his father, young Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien) takes comfort in watching action movies featuring the indestructible Los Angeles cop Jack Slater (Arnold Schwarzenegger). After being given a magic ticket by theater manager Nick (Robert Prosky), Danny is sucked into the screen and bonds with Slater. When evil fictional villain Benedict (Charles Dance) gets his hands on the ticket and enters the real world, Danny and Jack must follow and stop him.

programme.title: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: His faith broken by many years fighting in the Crusades, a knight named Behman (Nicolas Cage) returns to Europe and finds it ravaged by the Black Plague. A dying cardinal orders Behman and his friend, Felson (Ron Perlman), to take an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will destroy her powers and end the pestilence. As Behman and five comrades undertake the dangerous journey, they come to realize that the prisoner is no ordinary girl, and evil forces await at the destination.

programme.desc: Trapped in their New York brownstone's panic room, a hidden chamber built as a sanctuary in the event of break-ins, newly divorced Meg Altman (Jodie Foster) and her young daughter Sarah (Kristen Stewart) play a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with three intruders - Burnham (Forest Whitaker), Raoul (Dwight Yoakam) and Junior (Jared Leto) - during a brutal home invasion. But the room itself is the focal point because what the intruders really want is inside it.

The team incurs the wrath of both U.S. and Nigerian forces when they side with Kendricks and attempt to march the refugees to safety.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: A murder case reunites Crockett with a killer (Guy Boyd) who tricked the detective into freeing him from death row.

programme.title: Knight Rider
programme.desc: Michael Knight, fully healed, seeks revenge on the electronics-industry saboteurs who killed his partner.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall (Will Ferrell), his assistant Holly (Anna Friel) and a survivalist Will (Danny R. McBride) into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks. With few resources at their disposal, Rick, Holly and Will must rely on their only ally, a primate named Chaka (Jorma Taccone), to try to survive long enough to figure out a way back home.

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: For Buffy Summers (Kristy Swanson), nothing is the same after she meets Merrick Jamison-Smythe (Donald Sutherland). Merrick tells the teen that he's been sent to train her to fight vampires, and he proves himself by displaying his supernatural powers. Buffy is a quick study, and soon takes fellow student Oliver Pike (Luke Perry) under her wing, repeatedly saving him from fierce bloodsuckers. But, when a very dangerous vampire (Rutger Hauer) gets rambunctious, she must go to war again.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Reporter Angela (Jennifer Carpenter) and her cameraman Scott (Steve Harris) are doing a story on night-shift firefighters for a reality-TV program. A late-night distress call takes them to a Los Angeles apartment building, where the police are investigating a report of horrific screams. The TV team and emergency workers find an old woman, who suddenly attacks with teeth bared. What's more, Angela and company find that the building has been sealed by CDC workers. Then the attacks really begin.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Following the death of his father, young Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien) takes comfort in watching action movies featuring the indestructible Los Angeles cop Jack Slater (Arnold Schwarzenegger). After being given a magic ticket by theater manager Nick (Robert Prosky), Danny is sucked into the screen and bonds with Slater. When evil fictional villain Benedict (Charles Dance) gets his hands on the ticket and enters the real world, Danny and Jack must follow and stop him.

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: When the Italian Mafia threatens to kill a crooked bookie (John Turturro), Irish mob boss Leo O'Bannon (Albert Finney) refuses to allow it, chiefly because he's dating the bookie's sister, crafty gun moll Verna Bernbaum (Marcia Gay Harden). Leo's right-hand man, Tom Reagan (Gabriel Byrne), is also seeing Verna on the sly, and when he's found out is obliged to switch sides, going to work for the Italian mob amidst a dramatically escalating gang war over liquor distribution.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In need of a vacation from his ordinary life, factory worker Douglas Quaid (Colin Farrell) visits Rekall, a company that can turn dreams into real memories. Thinking that memories of life as a superspy are just the ticket, Quaid undergoes the procedure -- but it goes horribly wrong. Suddenly, Quaid is a hunted man. He teams up with a rebel fighter (Jessica Biel) on a search to find the head of the underground resistance and take down the leader (Bryan Cranston) of the free world.

programme.title: The Siege
programme.desc: After terrorists attack a bus in Brooklyn, a Broadway theater and FBI headquarters, FBI anti-terrorism expert Anthony Hubbard (Denzel Washington) teams up with CIA agent Elise Kraft (Annette Bening) to investigate. Soon, martial law is declared in New York City, and General William Devereaux (Bruce Willis), a sadistic racist, is put in command. When Devereaux begins rounding up Arab-Americans and forcing them into a detention camp, Hubbard and Kraft must fight back in the name of freedom.

programme.title: Stripes
programme.desc: Hard-luck cabbie John Winger (Bill Murray) -- directionless after being fired from his job and dumped by his girlfriend -- enlists in the U.S. Army with his close pal, Russell Ziskey (Harold Ramis). After his barely satisfactory performance in basic training, the irreverent Winger emerges as the figurehead for a ragtag band of Army misfits. However, his hijinks threaten to cause an international scandal when he inadvertently commandeers a military assault vehicle behind enemy lines.

programme.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
programme.desc: For Buffy Summers (Kristy Swanson), nothing is the same after she meets Merrick Jamison-Smythe (Donald Sutherland). Merrick tells the teen that he's been sent to train her to fight vampires, and he proves himself by displaying his supernatural powers. Buffy is a quick study, and soon takes fellow student Oliver Pike (Luke Perry) under her wing, repeatedly saving him from fierce bloodsuckers. But, when a very dangerous vampire (Rutger Hauer) gets rambunctious, she must go to war again.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A space-time vortex sucks scientist Rick Marshall (Will Ferrell), his assistant Holly (Anna Friel) and a survivalist Will (Danny R. McBride) into a world populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks. With few resources at their disposal, Rick, Holly and Will must rely on their only ally, a primate named Chaka (Jorma Taccone), to try to survive long enough to figure out a way back home.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Reporter Angela (Jennifer Carpenter) and her cameraman Scott (Steve Harris) are doing a story on night-shift firefighters for a reality-TV program. A late-night distress call takes them to a Los Angeles apartment building, where the police are investigating a report of horrific screams. The TV team and emergency workers find an old woman, who suddenly attacks with teeth bared. What's more, Angela and company find that the building has been sealed by CDC workers. Then the attacks really begin.

programme.title: The King and I
programme.desc: Anna, an English schoolteacher, travels to the kingdom of Siam to teach children and finds her challenge with a stubborn king. But even as a wondrous friendship grows between Anna and the arrogant monarch, an evil sorcerer is conjuring up a plot to steal the throne.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: Born with the snout of a pig, young Penelope Wilhern (Christina Ricci) spends life a virtual prisoner in her home. Believing that the only way to break the curse is to marry one of her own kind, she meets a number of suitors, but all reject her. Two devious men, one with a grudge against the family, hire a man (James McAvoy) to pose as a suitor, but complications arise when he begins to fall in love with Penelope, and she makes a bid for freedom.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: In the years after the Civil War, Jo March lives in New York and makes her living as a writer, while her sister Amy studies painting in Paris. Amy has a chance encounter with Theodore, a childhood crush who proposed to Jo but was ultimately rejected. Their oldest sibling, Meg, is married to a schoolteacher, while shy sister Beth develops a devastating illness that brings the family back together.

programme.title: Daddy Day Camp
programme.desc: Spurred on by their wives' insistence that their children attend summer camp, daycare entrepreneurs Charlie Hinton (Cuba Gooding Jr.) and his friend Phil (Paul Rae) decide to buy their dilapidated alma mater, Camp Driftwood. The men face a near impossible task; not only must they renovate the place, but they face stiff competition from nearby Camp Canola, which is run by Charlie's arch-rival, Lance (Lochlyn Munro). Charlie asks his estranged father for help in restoring Driftwood's former glory.

programme.title: The Adventures of Brer Rabbit
programme.desc: A mischievous rabbit (Nick Cannon) hatches clever schemes to gleefully outwit bigger animals.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Twenty-thousand years ago, Earth is a wondrous, prehistoric world filled with great danger, not the least of which is the beginning of the Ice Age. To avoid a really bad frostbite, the planet's majestic creatures - and a few small, slothful ones - begin migrating south . The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
programme.desc: The princess and her prince adopt a little girl, but the child is soon kidnapped and taken into the forest.

programme.title: Planet 51
programme.desc: When astronaut Capt. Charles "Chuck" Baker lands on Planet 51, he thinks he is the first life form to set foot there. He gets the surprise of his life when he learns that it is inhabited by little green people who live in an idyllic version of 1950s America -- complete with a universal fear of alien invasion.

programme.title: Swift
programme.desc: Thinking he is a seagull, a bird named Manou discovers that he is actually a swift who was adopted. When tragedy strikes, Manou sets off on a quest to learn his true identity -- and save his friends and family along the way.

programme.title: Aliens Ate My Homework
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Rod Allbright and his cousin Elspeth help the Galactic Patrol protect Earth from a nefarious threat.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Twenty-thousand years ago, Earth is a wondrous, prehistoric world filled with great danger, not the least of which is the beginning of the Ice Age. To avoid a really bad frostbite, the planet's majestic creatures - and a few small, slothful ones - begin migrating south . The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.

The men face a near impossible task; not only must they renovate the place, but they face stiff competition from nearby Camp Canola, which is run by Charlie's arch-rival, Lance (Lochlyn Munro). Charlie asks his estranged father for help in restoring Driftwood's former glory.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two young kids become spies in attempt to save their parents, who are ex-spies, from an evil mastermind. Armed with a bag of high tech gadgets and out-of-this world transportation, Carmen (Alexa Vega) and Juni (Daryl Sabara) will bravely jet through the air, dive under the seas and crisscross the globe in a series of thrilling adventures on a mission to save their parents ... and maybe even the world.

programme.title: Aliens Ate My Homework
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Rod Allbright and his cousin Elspeth help the Galactic Patrol protect Earth from a nefarious threat.

programme.title: Planet 51
programme.desc: When astronaut Capt. Charles "Chuck" Baker lands on Planet 51, he thinks he is the first life form to set foot there. programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: Born with the snout of a pig, young Penelope Wilhern (Christina Ricci) spends life a virtual prisoner in her home. Believing that the only way to break the curse is to marry one of her own kind, she meets a number of suitors, but all reject her. Two devious men, one with a grudge against the family, hire a man (James McAvoy) to pose as a suitor, but complications arise when he begins to fall in love with Penelope, and she makes a bid for freedom.

programme.title: Rookie of the Year
programme.desc: A freak accident causes 12-year-old Little League player Henry (Thomas Ian Nicholas) to become such a powerful and accurate pitcher that the Chicago Cubs sign the junior high student to a contract. Unprepared for such a high-pressure environment, Henry falters until aging fastballer Chet Steadman (Gary Busey) takes him under his wing and teaches him how to play in the big leagues. Meanwhile, his mother's venal boyfriend (Bruce Altman) tries to sell Henry's contract to a hated opposing team.

programme.title: Guardians of Oz
programme.desc: Ozzy, a winged monkey, seeks help from the Tin Woodman, the Cowardly Lion and the Scarecrow to stop the evil plans of the wicked Evilene.

programme.title: My All American
programme.desc: Awarded a scholarship to the University of Texas at Austin, small but scrappy Freddie Steinmark gets a chance to play football for coach Darrell Royal (Aaron Eckhart) and the Longhorns in the late 1960s. Alongside old teammate Bobby Mitchell and new friend James Street, Steinmark helps the Longhorns find success. When Freddie suffers an injury that leads to a shocking diagnosis, the young man must utilize his indomitable spirit and courage to rise to the challenge like a true champion.

programme.title: Thumbelina
programme.desc: Born of a flower and growing to only a couple of inches tall, poor Thumbelina (Jodi Benson) is worried she'll never meet someone her own size, until she happens to catch the eye of Prince Cornelius of the Fairies (Gary Imhoff). Just as soon as she finds love, however, it's torn away from her when she is kidnapped by Ms. Toad (Charo). Now Thumbelina has to escape Ms. Toad's grasp and search for Prince Cornelius. Luckily, there's a whole city of animals willing to help her.

programme.title: Radio
programme.desc: In a racially divided town, coach Jones (Ed Harris) spots a mentally disabled African-American student named Radio (Cuba Gooding Jr.) near his practice field and is inspired to befriend him. Soon, Radio is Jones' loyal assistant, and principal Daniels (Alfre Woodard) happily notes that Radio's self-confidence is skyrocketing. But things start to sour when Jones begins taking guff from fans who feel that his devotion to Radio is getting in the way of the team's quest for a championship.

programme.title: Pit Pony
programme.desc: Ned learns a hard lesson about his new job when there is a collapse in the pit; Nellie teaches Ned a lesson in teamwork.

programme.title: Rookie of the Year
programme.desc: A freak accident causes 12-year-old Little League player Henry (Thomas Ian Nicholas) to become such a powerful and accurate pitcher that the Chicago Cubs sign the junior high student to a contract. Unprepared for such a high-pressure environment, Henry falters until aging fastballer Chet Steadman (Gary Busey) takes him under his wing and teaches him how to play in the big leagues. Meanwhile, his mother's venal boyfriend (Bruce Altman) tries to sell Henry's contract to a hated opposing team.

programme.title: A Troll in Central Park
programme.desc: After being banished from his grim kingdom, Stanley (Dom DeLuise), an amiable troll with a magical talent for growing greenery, ends up in Central Park. Struggling to adapt to his unfamiliar surroundings, Stanley is befriended by young Gus (Phillip Glasser) and his little sister, Rosie (Tawny Sunshine Glover). Soon, however, the evil troll queen, Gnorga (Cloris Leachman), sets out to make Stanley's life miserable, endangering both him and the children.

programme.title: Yellowbird
programme.desc: Yellowbird (Seth Green), a tiny orphaned bird that has never left the nest, suddenly finds himself leading a flock on its migration to Africa.

programme.title: Thumbelina
programme.desc: Born of a flower and growing to only a couple of inches tall, poor Thumbelina (Jodi Benson) is worried she'll never meet someone her own size, until she happens to catch the eye of Prince Cornelius of the Fairies (Gary Imhoff). programme.title: Rookie of the Year

Unprepared for such a high-pressure environment, Henry falters until aging fastballer Chet Steadman (Gary Busey) takes him under his wing and teaches him how to play in the big leagues. Meanwhile, his mother's venal boyfriend (Bruce Altman) tries to sell Henry's contract to a hated opposing team.

programme.title: Yellowbird
programme.desc: Yellowbird (Seth Green), a tiny orphaned bird that has never left the nest, suddenly finds himself leading a flock on its migration to Africa.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: Jen (Stephen Garlick), raised by the noble race called the Mystics, has been told that he is the last survivor of his own race, the Gelflings. He sets out to try to find a shard of the dark crystal, a powerful gem that once provided balance to the universe. After the crystal was broken, the evil Skeksis used sinister means to gain control. Jen believes that he can repair the dark crystal and bring peace back to the world, if he can only find the remaining shard.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Mystery of the Enchanted Treasure
programme.desc: The spirited animals of Swan Lake help their prince and princess save the kingdom from a sinister sorceress.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: Royally Undercover
programme.desc: A princess and her friends go under cover to investigate the arrival of mysterious visitors to their kingdom.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: Princess Tomorrow, Pirate Today!
programme.desc: Princess Alise and her gang of swashbucklers set out on a high seas journey. When they're shipwrecked on a wild, mysterious island, they make a new friend and work together to escape ferocious beasts.

programme.title: The Swan Princess Christmas
programme.desc: A kingdom unites to prevent a villain from destroying Christmas.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette is once again transformed into a swan as Prince Derek prepares to battle an evil magician.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Family Tale
programme.desc: The princess and her prince adopt a little girl, but the child is soon kidnapped and taken into the forest.

programme.title: The Big Bad Fox and Other Tales...
programme.desc: The countryside isn't always as calm and peaceful as it's made out to be, and the animals on this farm are particularly agitated: a fox who mothers a family of chicks, a rabbit who plays the stork, and a duck who wants to be Santa Claus.

programme.title: Playmobil: The Movie
programme.desc: Maria and her younger brother Charlie find themselves magically transported to the fantastical world of Playmobil. While there, they encounter robots, Vikings, knights, pirates and other colorfully amusing characters. But when Charlie winds up in the clutches of an evil emperor, Maria joins forces with a bumbling secret agent and an adventurous truck driver to rescue her beloved sibling.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: Jen (Stephen Garlick), raised by the noble race called the Mystics, has been told that he is the last survivor of his own race, the Gelflings. He sets out to try to find a shard of the dark crystal, a powerful gem that once provided balance to the universe. After the crystal was broken, the evil Skeksis used sinister means to gain control. Jen believes that he can repair the dark crystal and bring peace back to the world, if he can only find the remaining shard.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two young kids become spies in attempt to save their parents, who are ex-spies, from an evil mastermind. Armed with a bag of high tech gadgets and out-of-this world transportation, Carmen (Alexa Vega) and Juni (Daryl Sabara) will bravely jet through the air, dive under the seas and crisscross the globe in a series of thrilling adventures on a mission to save their parents ... and maybe even the world.

programme.title: Kit Kittredge: An American Girl
programme.desc: Kit Kittredge (Abigail Breslin), a girl growing up in Depression-era Cincinnati, has a nose for news and a knack for picking up strays. When a crime spree hits the Ohio city, all evidence points to the local hobo community, particularly Kit's friend Will. She recruits her friends Ruthie and Stirling to sniff out the real thief, but the children uncover a plot that reaches far beyond Cincinnati.

programme.title: The Big Bad Fox and Other Tales...
programme.desc: The countryside isn't always as calm and peaceful as it's made out to be, and the animals on this farm are particularly agitated: a fox who mothers a family of chicks, a rabbit who plays the stork, and a duck who wants to be Santa Claus.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: Jen (Stephen Garlick), raised by the noble race called the Mystics, has been told that he is the last survivor of his own race, the Gelflings. He sets out to try to find a shard of the dark crystal, a powerful gem that once provided balance to the universe. After the crystal was broken, the evil Skeksis used sinister means to gain control. Jen believes that he can repair the dark crystal and bring peace back to the world, if he can only find the remaining shard.

programme.title: Playmobil: The Movie
programme.desc: Maria and her younger brother Charlie find themselves magically transported to the fantastical world of Playmobil. While there, they encounter robots, Vikings, knights, pirates and other colorfully amusing characters. But when Charlie winds up in the clutches of an evil emperor, Maria joins forces with a bumbling secret agent and an adventurous truck driver to rescue her beloved sibling.

programme.title: The Sandlot 2
programme.desc: A gang of baseball playing kids manage to get hold of a model NASA rocket belonging to one of their parents. When they accidentally shoot it into a nearby junkyard, they have to make a plan to get past a super-ferocious, mutated guard dog known as "The Great Fear".

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Roy McCormick (Martin Lawrence) is a college basketball coach more famous for his temper than for his coaching ability. After one of his rages gets him banned from the sport, Roy takes a job coaching basketball at a middle school in an attempt to repair his reputation. Amazingly, what Roy began as a show of rehabilitation begins to genuinely change him, and he learns to care for his team. His relationship with local mom Jeanie (Wendy Raquel Robinson) is a good influence as well.

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: While truant from school, young siblings Jeremy and Jemima meet the beautiful Truly Scrumptious (Sally Ann Howes), who falls for their widowed father, Caractacus Potts (Dick Van Dyke), and his various oddball inventions, including the family's noisy rebuilt car, Chitty Chitty Bang Bang. One day at the beach, Caractacus tells Truly and the children a fanciful fable about the villainous Baron Bomburst (Gert Frobe) and his evil designs on the Potts family car.

programme.title: Kit Kittredge: An American Girl
programme.desc: Kit Kittredge (Abigail Breslin), a girl growing up in Depression-era Cincinnati, has a nose for news and a knack for picking up strays. When a crime spree hits the Ohio city, all evidence points to the local hobo community, particularly Kit's friend Will. She recruits her friends Ruthie and Stirling to sniff out the real thief, but the children uncover a plot that reaches far beyond Cincinnati.

programme.title: The Little Rascals Save the Day
programme.desc: Spanky (Jet Jurgensmeyer), Alfalfa (Drew Justice) and the rest of the gang try to raise enough cash to save a bakery.

programme.title: Playmobil: The Movie
programme.desc: Maria and her younger brother Charlie find themselves magically transported to the fantastical world of Playmobil. While there, they encounter robots, Vikings, knights, pirates and other colorfully amusing characters. But when Charlie winds up in the clutches of an evil emperor, Maria joins forces with a bumbling secret agent and an adventurous truck driver to rescue her beloved sibling.

programme.title: Pit Pony
programme.desc: Charley (Denny Doherty) is injured on a fishing trip and Willie (Alex Wrathell) has to rely on his friends to get things done.

programme.title: Pit Pony
programme.desc: Willie (Alex Wrathell) discovers Spider's (Matthew Harris) secret; Ned (Shaun Smyth) takes Spider in when his home burns.

programme.title: The Master of Disguise
programme.desc: Pistachio Disguisey (Dana Carvey), a genial waiter at his father Frabbrizio's (James Brolin) Italian restaurant, possesses an uncanny knack for mimicry. What he doesn't know is that his talent is genetic, and that he is the descendent of a long line of "Masters of Disguise," all of whom have inherited the secret family gift known as Energico. Initially, Pistachio is a klutz, but little by little, he learns to harness his inherited power, and sallies forth to utilize Energico to its fullest.

programme.title: Thumbelina
programme.desc: Born of a flower and growing to only a couple of inches tall, poor Thumbelina (Jodi Benson) is worried she'll never meet someone her own size, until she happens to catch the eye of Prince Cornelius of the Fairies (Gary Imhoff). Just as soon as she finds love, however, it's torn away from her when she is kidnapped by Ms. Toad (Charo). Now Thumbelina has to escape Ms. Toad's grasp and search for Prince Cornelius. Luckily, there's a whole city of animals willing to help her.

programme.title: Flicka: Country Pride
programme.desc: Toby (Clint Black) and Flicka step in to help a stable owner (Lisa Hartman Black) and her daughter (Kacey Rohl) save their business from falling to a rival horse trainer who is stealing their clients.

programme.title: The Little Rascals Save the Day
programme.desc: Spanky (Jet Jurgensmeyer), Alfalfa (Drew Justice) and the rest of the gang try to raise enough cash to save a bakery.

programme.title: My All American
programme.desc: Awarded a scholarship to the University of Texas at Austin, small but scrappy Freddie Steinmark gets a chance to play football for coach Darrell Royal (Aaron Eckhart) and the Longhorns in the late 1960s. Alongside old teammate Bobby Mitchell and new friend James Street, Steinmark helps the Longhorns find success. When Freddie suffers an injury that leads to a shocking diagnosis, the young man must utilize his indomitable spirit and courage to rise to the challenge like a true champion.

programme.title: The Master of Disguise
programme.desc: Pistachio Disguisey (Dana Carvey), a genial waiter at his father Frabbrizio's (James Brolin) Italian restaurant, possesses an uncanny knack for mimicry. What he doesn't know is that his talent is genetic, and that he is the descendent of a long line of "Masters of Disguise," all of whom have inherited the secret family gift known as Energico. Initially, Pistachio is a klutz, but little by little, he learns to harness his inherited power, and sallies forth to utilize Energico to its fullest.

programme.title: The Wave
programme.desc: When Frank goes out on the town to celebrate an upcoming promotion, his night takes an unexpected and bizarre turn when he is dosed with a hallucinogen that alters his perception and changes his life forever.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: During a nuclear test, the French government inadvertently mutates a lizard nest; years later, a giant lizard makes its way to New York City. Dr. Niko Tatopoulos (Matthew Broderick), an expert on the effects of radiation on animals, is sent by the U.S. government to study the beast. When the creature, dubbed "Godzilla" by news outlets, emerges, a massive battle with the military begins. To make matters worse, Niko discovers that Godzilla has laid a nest of 200 eggs, which are ready to hatch.

programme.title: Rig 45
programme.desc: A murder aboard the platform confirms suspicions that someone is behind the accidents; tensions between crew members increase.

programme.title: The Covenant
programme.desc: In the 17th century, five families with supernatural powers make a pact of silence. Eventually one power-hungry family is banished. The descendants of those four remaining families are heirs to tremendous power. Known as the Sons of Ipswich, the boys attend elite Spencer Academy. When a student there is found dead after a party, unraveling secrets threaten to shatter the pact that has protected the boys' families for centuries.

programme.title: Bloodline
programme.desc: Haunted by dark memories of childhood abuse, Evan, a social worker and first-time dad, struggles to keep his need for revenge in check.

programme.title: Tales From the Crypt Presents Demon Knight
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Frank Brayker (William Sadler) is the guardian of an ancient key that can unlock tremendous evil; the sinister but charming Collector (Billy Zane) is a demon who wants the key so he can initiate the apocalypse. On the run from wicked mercenaries for almost 90 years, Brayker finally stops in at a boarding house in New Mexico where -- with the help of its quirky residents -- he plans to face off against the Collector and his band of ghouls, preventing them from ever seizing the key.

programme.title: The Grudge 2
programme.desc: A young woman (Amber Tamblyn) encounters a terrible curse while searching for her missing sister (Sarah Michelle Gellar) in Tokyo. The evil imprecation fills its victims with murderous rage, but it also brings together the diverse group to unlock its secret and save their lives.

programme.title: The Fury
programme.desc: When a devious plot separates CIA agent Peter Sandza (Kirk Douglas) from his son, Robin (Andrew Stevens), the distraught father manages to see through the ruse. Taken because of his psychic abilities, Robin is being held by Ben Childress (John Cassavetes), who is studying people with supernatural powers in hopes of developing their talents as weapons. Soon Peter pairs up with Gillian (Amy Irving), a teen who has telekinesis, to find and rescue Robin.

programme.title: Burn
programme.desc: Melinda is a lonely and unstable gas-station attendant who's tired of being overshadowed by her more confident and outgoing co-worker. When a robber holds up the station at gunpoint, Melinda tries to make a connection with the desperate thief.

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: When the Italian Mafia threatens to kill a crooked bookie (John Turturro), Irish mob boss Leo O'Bannon (Albert Finney) refuses to allow it, chiefly because he's dating the bookie's sister, crafty gun moll Verna Bernbaum (Marcia Gay Harden). Leo's right-hand man, Tom Reagan (Gabriel Byrne), is also seeing Verna on the sly, and when he's found out is obliged to switch sides, going to work for the Italian mob amidst a dramatically escalating gang war over liquor distribution.

programme.title: Extinction
programme.desc: When an infection turns most of humanity into rabid zombies, two men (Matthew Fox, Jeffrey Donovan) and a 9-year-old girl (Quinn McColgan) must barricade themselves against their monstrous attackers.

Ben Campbell (Jim Sturgess), a brilliant student at Massachusetts Institute of Technology, needs some quick cash to pay his tuition bills. He joins a group of students who, under the leadership of unorthodox professor Mickey Rosa (Kevin Spacey), use their math skills to win big in Las Vegas. Seduced by a beautiful teammate (Kate Bosworth) and loads of money, Ben learns that the stakes are higher than he ever imagined when he crosses paths with casino enforcer Cole Williams (Laurence Fishburne).

programme.title: Burn
programme.desc: Melinda is a lonely and unstable gas-station attendant who's tired of being overshadowed by her more confident and outgoing co-worker. When a robber holds up the station at gunpoint, Melinda tries to make a connection with the desperate thief.

He joins a group of students who, under the leadership of unorthodox professor Mickey Rosa (Kevin Spacey), use their math skills to win big in Las Vegas. Seduced by a beautiful teammate (Kate Bosworth) and loads of money, Ben learns that the stakes are higher than he ever imagined when he crosses paths with casino enforcer Cole Williams (Laurence Fishburne).

programme.title: Rig 45
programme.desc: The crew does its best to reestablish communications with the outside world; the number of victims increases.

programme.title: L.A. Confidential
programme.desc: Three policemen, each with his own motives and obsessions, tackle the corruption surrounding an unsolved murder at a downtown Los Angeles coffee shop in the early 1950s. Detective Lieutenant Exley (Guy Pearce), the son of a murdered detective, is out to avenge his father's killing. The ex-partner of Officer White (Russell Crowe), implicated in a scandal rooted out by Exley, was one of the victims. Sergeant Vincennes (Kevin Spacey) feeds classified information to a tabloid magnate (Danny DeVito).

programme.title: Natural Born Killers
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson and Juliette Lewis are two young, attractive serial killers who become tabloid-TV darlings, thanks to a sensationalistic press led by Robert Downey Jr. The press reports the pair as they go on a 52 people killing spree. A controversial look at the way the media portrays criminals.

programme.title: The Lazarus Effect
programme.desc: Medical researcher Frank (Mark Duplass), his fiancee Zoe (Olivia Wilde) and their team have achieved the impossible: they have found a way to revive the dead. After a successful, but unsanctioned, experiment on a lifeless animal, they are ready to make their work public. However, when their dean learns what they've done, he shuts them down. Zoe is killed during an attempt to recreate the experiment, leading Frank to test the process on her. Zoe is revived -- but something evil is within her.

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: Unpopular nerd Arnie Cunningham (Keith Gordon) buys a 1958 Plymouth Fury, which he names Christine. Arnie develops an unhealthy obsession with the car, to the alarm of his jock friend, Dennis Guilder (John Stockwell). After bully Buddy Repperton (William Ostrander) defaces Christine, the auto restores itself to perfect condition and begins killing off Buddy and his friends. Determined to stop the deaths, Dennis and Arnie's girlfriend, Leigh Cabot (Alexandra Paul), decide to destroy Christine.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
programme.desc: As Umbrella Corp.'s deadly T-virus continues to turn the world's population into legions of flesh-eating zombies, Alice (Milla Jovovich), the human race's last hope, awakes deep within Umbrella's secret operations facility. The further she delves into the complex, the more of her mysterious past is unveiled. Her global hunt for those responsible for the outbreak leads to a mind-blowing revelation; Aided by friends old and new, Alice fights to escape from a world on the edge of oblivion.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: An ex-con takes a job truck driving across the country. However, the truck is filled with illegal weapons and now he must fight to save his family. The stakes are high as gun runners, government agents and a fleet of monstrous 18-wheelers pursue him in an intense highway duel.

programme.title: Get Carter
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone plays Jack Carter, a Vegas mobster who comes home to Seattle to bury his brother after an apparent car accident. Once home he begins to believe that it may not have been an accident. His two-day journey through the underbelly of the city leads Jack through revenge, reconnection with a family he left behind many year earlier, and, ultimately, redemption.

programme.title: Animal Kingdom
programme.desc: In this gritty Australian crime drama, young Joshua "J" Cody (James Frecheville) is taken in by his extended family after his mother dies of an overdose. This branch of the Cody clan, overseen by J's scheming grandmother, Janine (Jacki Weaver), is heavily involved in various criminal activities, and they quickly indoctrinate the boy into their way of life. However, J is given an opportunity to take a different route when a cop named Leckie (Guy Pearce) seeks to help him leave the family fold.

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Discreet, idealistic and intensely loyal, Edward Wilson (Matt Damon) finds that service in the OSS and later as a founding member of the Central Intelligence Agency is the perfect career for a man of his talents. His methods become standard operating procedure for the CIA while he combats his counterparts in the KGB. But, as the country slips deeper into the Cold War, Edward finds that dedication to duty above family has a price.

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: Unpopular nerd Arnie Cunningham (Keith Gordon) buys a 1958 Plymouth Fury, which he names Christine. Arnie develops an unhealthy obsession with the car, to the alarm of his jock friend, Dennis Guilder (John Stockwell). After bully Buddy Repperton (William Ostrander) defaces Christine, the auto restores itself to perfect condition and begins killing off Buddy and his friends. Determined to stop the deaths, Dennis and Arnie's girlfriend, Leigh Cabot (Alexandra Paul), decide to destroy Christine.

programme.title: Black Dog
programme.desc: An ex-con takes a job truck driving across the country. However, the truck is filled with illegal weapons and now he must fight to save his family. The stakes are high as gun runners, government agents and a fleet of monstrous 18-wheelers pursue him in an intense highway duel.

programme.title: Animal Kingdom
programme.desc: In this gritty Australian crime drama, young Joshua "J" Cody (James Frecheville) is taken in by his extended family after his mother dies of an overdose. This branch of the Cody clan, overseen by J's scheming grandmother, Janine (Jacki Weaver), is heavily involved in various criminal activities, and they quickly indoctrinate the boy into their way of life. However, J is given an opportunity to take a different route when a cop named Leckie (Guy Pearce) seeks to help him leave the family fold.

programme.title: Rig 45
programme.desc: The remaining crew members are separated into two groups, and suspicions abound about who is the killer.

programme.title: Rig 45
programme.desc: The hurricane begins to move away from the area, and a dangerous chasing game begins on board the platform among the crew members.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Vampires
programme.desc: Ever since his parents were murdered by vampires, Jack Crow (James Woods) has had one purpose in life: putting stakes through bloodsuckers' hearts. With his battle-hardened crew of vampire killers and the assistance of the Catholic Church, Crow roams the New Mexico desert looking for undead lairs to annihilate. But he meets his match when, at a roadside motel, he comes face to face with Jan Valek (Thomas Ian Griffith), a vampire kingpin possessed of incredible powers.

programme.title: Innocent Blood
programme.desc: Marie is a vampire with a conscience: She only sucks the blood of criminals. And she has plenty to choose from on the mean streets of Pittsburgh, where a gang war is raging. But Marie slips up when she accidentally turns a violent crime lord, Sal Macelli (Robert Loggia), into one of the walking dead. To stop a takeover of the city by blood-sucking gangsters, Marie joins forces with an undercover cop (Anthony LaPaglia) who has his own score to settle.

programme.title: The Scorpion King 2: Rise of a Warrior
programme.desc: After a swarm of enchanted scorpions kills his father, Mathayus (Michael Copon) flees and vows to even the score with ruthless sorcerer Sargon (Randy Couture). Upon returning home after years of combat training, Mathayus finds that Sargon has seized the crown and protected himself with a powerful spell. To retrieve the only weapon capable of destroying the tyrant -- a mystical sword -- Mathayus and lady warrior Layla (Karen David) set off for a labyrinth guarded by a deadly Minotaur.

programme.title: The Covenant
programme.desc: In the 17th century, five families with supernatural powers make a pact of silence. Eventually one power-hungry family is banished. The descendants of those four remaining families are heirs to tremendous power. Known as the Sons of Ipswich, the boys attend elite Spencer Academy. When a student there is found dead after a party, unraveling secrets threaten to shatter the pact that has protected the boys' families for centuries.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Joseph Pistone (Johnny Depp) is an FBI agent who has infiltrated one of the major New York Mafia families and is living under the name Donnie Brasco. He develops a relationship with mob hit man Benjamin "Lefty" Ruggiero (Al Pacino) in order to get deeper under cover, but ends up developing a real friendship with the Mafioso. As their relationship develops, Pistone must decide whether or not to complete his job, knowing that it will lead to the murder of his new friend.

programme.title: Stratton
programme.desc: After the death of his American counterpart, an MI6 agent and his team must race against time to stop a madman from unleashing stolen chemical weapons.

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: Master criminal Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro) is trying to control the rogue actions of one of his men, while also planning one last big heist before retiring. Meanwhile, Lieutenant Hanna (Al Pacino) attempts to track down McCauley as he deals with the chaos in his own life, including the infidelity of his wife (Diane Venora) and the mental health of his stepdaughter (Natalie Portman). McCauley and Hanna discover a mutual respect, even as they try to thwart each other's plans.

programme.title: Vacancy
programme.desc: When David (Luke Wilson) and Amy's (Kate Beckinsale) car breaks down, they have little choice but to spend the night at a remote hotel. The couple entertain themselves by watching low-budget slasher movies on TV -- until they realize that the horrifying images they see were recorded in the room in which they are staying. With hidden cameras capturing their every move, David and Amy must find a way out before they become the latest stars in another film in the series of snuff films.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: A firefighter (Howie Long) and his mentor (Scott Glenn) encounter an escaped convict (William Forsythe) and his cohorts in a blazing forest.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Joseph Pistone (Johnny Depp) is an FBI agent who has infiltrated one of the major New York Mafia families and is living under the name Donnie Brasco. He develops a relationship with mob hit man Benjamin "Lefty" Ruggiero (Al Pacino) in order to get deeper under cover, but ends up developing a real friendship with the Mafioso. As their relationship develops, Pistone must decide whether or not to complete his job, knowing that it will lead to the murder of his new friend.

programme.desc: Master criminal Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro) is trying to control the rogue actions of one of his men, while also planning one last big heist before retiring. Meanwhile, Lieutenant Hanna (Al Pacino) attempts to track down McCauley as he deals with the chaos in his own life, including the infidelity of his wife (Diane Venora) and the mental health of his stepdaughter (Natalie Portman). McCauley and Hanna discover a mutual respect, even as they try to thwart each other's plans.

programme.title: Anthropoid
programme.desc: In December 1941, two Czech soldiers (Cillian Murphy, Jamie Dornan) parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich (Detlef Bothe).

programme.title: Beneath Us
programme.desc: Undocumented workers are lured into a wealthy woman's home with the promise of work, only to discover the terrifying fate she has in store for them.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: Cellular
programme.desc: Schoolteacher Jessica Martin (Kim Basinger) is abducted by ruthless crook Ethan (Jason Statham) and brought to a remote hideout, where she finds a broken cell phone. Unfortunately, when she tries to use the malfunctioning phone to contact the authorities, she accidentally reaches college student Ryan (Chris Evans) instead. The young man wants to help Jessica, but she has no idea where her captors have taken her, and Ryan must scramble to figure out where she is before his cell phone goes dead.

programme.title: Firestorm
programme.desc: A firefighter (Howie Long) and his mentor (Scott Glenn) encounter an escaped convict (William Forsythe) and his cohorts in a blazing forest.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: The epic story of Henri "Papillon" Charrière, a safecracker from the Parisian underworld who is framed for murder and condemned to life in the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island. Determined to regain his freedom, Papillon forms an unlikely alliance with convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, who in exchange for protection, agrees to finance Papillon's escape.

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: In the late 21st-century, a vampiric disease modifies some people, imbuing each of them with superhuman strength, intelligence and speed. Worldwide civil war looms as normal people, feeling threatened by their enhanced brethren, demand the extermination of the group. One such transformed female (Milla Jovovich) finds herself caught in the crossfire when she becomes the protector of a boy who is perceived to be a threat to humanity.

programme.title: Finding Steve McQueen
programme.desc: The FBI launches its biggest manhunt when an unlikely gang of thieves tries to steal $30 million in illegal campaign contributions from President Richard Nixon's secret fund.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: When rancher and single mother of two Maggie Gilkeson (Cate Blanchett) sees her teenage daughter, Lily (Evan Rachel Wood), kidnapped by Apache rebels, she reluctantly accepts the help of her estranged father, Samuel (Tommy Lee Jones), in tracking down the kidnappers. Along the way, the two must learn to reconcile the past and work together if they are going to have any hope of getting Lily back before she is taken over the border and forced to become a prostitute.

programme.title: Cellular
programme.desc: Schoolteacher Jessica Martin (Kim Basinger) is abducted by ruthless crook Ethan (Jason Statham) and brought to a remote hideout, where she finds a broken cell phone. Unfortunately, when she tries to use the malfunctioning phone to contact the authorities, she accidentally reaches college student Ryan (Chris Evans) instead. The young man wants to help Jessica, but she has no idea where her captors have taken her, and Ryan must scramble to figure out where she is before his cell phone goes dead.

programme.title: Papillon
programme.desc: The epic story of Henri "Papillon" Charrière, a safecracker from the Parisian underworld who is framed for murder and condemned to life in the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island. Determined to regain his freedom, Papillon forms an unlikely alliance with convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, who in exchange for protection, agrees to finance Papillon's escape.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz, un asesino en serie de Londres, ataca a agentes de la policía. El inspector jefe Roberts y el sargento Brant, un detective de la policía políticamente incorrecto, intentan detener al psicópata.

programme.title: La carrera de la muerte
programme.desc: Condenado por un crimen que no cometió, un piloto de carreras debe competir en una carrera mortal para ganar su libertad.

programme.title: Atrapen al gringo
programme.desc: Durante una persecución con la patrulla fronteriza, Driver estrella su auto contra el muro de la frontera. Tras ser apresado por las autoridades mexicanas, es enviado a una prisión de alta seguridad, donde recibe la inesperada ayuda de un niño de diez años que conoce como pocos el lugar.

programme.title: Red de corrupción
programme.desc: Después de presenciar lo que parece ser un asesinato, un mensajero que trabaja en bicicleta se involucra en un mundo de corrupción y carreras ilegales.

programme.title: Todo por un tenis
programme.desc: Un muchacho de 15 años pide ayuda a sus dos mejores amigos para recuperar sus zapatillas Air Jordan, que fueron robadas por un matón del vecindario.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Los guionistas Emma Donoghue, Nick Hornby, Meg LeFauve, Tom McCarthy, Amy Schumer y Aaron Sorkin hablan sobre qué reescribirían, cuál fue su mayor error y cuentan si usan Twitter.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Seis actrices dramáticas debaten acerca del nuevo panorama de la televisión.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Siete de los mejores creadores de cine y televisión hablan acerca de la fusión de géneros, la expansión de los universos ficticios y la responsabilidad de elegir a los actores adecuados.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Seis importantes creadores de televisión hablan acerca de superar los límites en la comedia y qué inspira su creatividad. Además, la diferencia entre escribir para cadena o una plataforma streaming.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Ava DuVernay, Noah Hawley, David E. Kelley, Jenji Kohan, Lisa Joy y Ryan Murphy hablan sobre cómo filmar temas delicados y sobre cuáles son las familias de la televisión con las que más se identifican.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Entrevistas con directores aclamados, como Guillermo del Toro, Angelina Jolie, Patty Jenkins, Joe Wright, Greta Gerwig y Denis Villeneuve.

programme.title: Algo celosa
programme.desc: Nathalie Pêcheux, una mujer divorciada y profesora de francés, comienza a sentir celos de su hija Mathilde, una atractiva bailarina de ballet clásico de 18 años.

programme.title: El mundo de Alexis
programme.desc: Alexis se enfrenta con la muerte de su esposo y regresa a casa para un funeral. Su hermana convence a Alexis para que regrese a su antigua carrera como organizadora de fiestas mientras ella inicia un nuevo romance.

programme.title: Al diablo con el amor
programme.desc: Genevieve es una florista que tiene un peculiar modo de ver la vida. Tras haber sufrido demasiado, debido a las decepciones amorosas, la joven ha decidido no tener más relaciones largas para evitar sufrir. Sin embargo, esta declaración de intenciones se ve truncada cuando conoce a Greg, el dueño de un restaurante que tampoco ha tenido demasiada suerte en el amor. Entre ellos surgirá una atracción difícil de evitar.

programme.title: Papá por Accidente
programme.desc: Cuando Kassie cumple los cuarenta decide no esperar más y recurre a la inseminación artificial para tener un bebé. Cuando siete años más tarde regresa a Nueva York, vuelve a ver a su amigo Wally, que se siente fuertemente vinculado al hijo de Kassie.

programme.title: Experta en bodas
programme.desc: La más prestigiosa organizadora de bodas de San Francisco se enamora de un pediatra que resulta ser su próximo cliente.

programme.title: Gánster americano
programme.desc: Frank Lucas utiliza su propia ingenuidad para llegar a la cima del crimen organizado del Harlem tras la muerte de su jefe, pero Richie Roberts, un policía excluido, busca la forma de llevar a su oponente ante la justicia.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Un caso que involucra a narcotraficantes y un asesinato en el sur de Florida da un giro personal para los detectives encubiertos Sonny Crockett y Ricardo Tubbs. El poco ortodoxo Crockett se enamora de la esposa china-cubana de un traficante de armas y drogas, mientras Tubbs se enfrenta a un ataque en contra de sus seres queridos.

programme.title: Asesino a sueldo
programme.desc: Una situación de identidad equivocada pone a un hombre llamado Slevin (Josh Hartnett) en medio de una guerra entre dos grandes del crimen en Nueva York : El Rabbi (Ben Kingsley) y el Boss (Morgan Freeman). Así, bajo la mirada del detective Brikowski (Stanley Tucci) y el ampliamente reconocido asesino Goodkat (Bruce Willis), Slevin deberá idear un plan para salvar su vida antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

programme.title: Juego de espías
programme.desc: El día de su jubilación, el veterano agente de la CIA Nathan Muir recibe la noticia de que su discípulo, Tom Bishop, se ha metido en un buen lío: acusado de espionaje, se encuentra en una prisión china y será ejecutado en un plazo de 24 horas.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Seis de los actores dramáticos más aclamados de la televisión hablan acerca de los puntos de inflexión en sus carreras.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Se habla sobre la diversidad y la filmación de escenas de sexo incómodas.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Entrevistas con actores aclamados, como James Franco, Tom Hanks, Gary Oldman, Willem Dafoe, John Boyega y Sam Rockwell.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Entrevistas con las aclamadas actrices Mary J. Blige, Emma Stone, Allison Janney, Saoirse Ronan, Jennifer Lawrence y Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Entrevistas con productores aclamados como Judd Apatow, Ridley Scott, Amy Pascal, Eric Fellner, Seth Rogen y Jason Blum.

programme.title: Mascotas de té
programme.desc: Nathan, una mascota de té, no cambia de color cuando se moja. Entonces, decide embarcarse en una aventura para descubrir por qué.

programme.title: Guerra de compromiso
programme.desc: Sam trata de ganarse a una chica con el " Bling Ring ", pero un súper villano, Oscar, complica las cosas.

programme.title: Una pareja más tonta
programme.desc: Tras descubrir que necesita un trasplante de riñón y que tiene una hija, Harry Dunne emprende un viaje en carretera con su amigo Lloyd Christmas.

programme.title: Zapatero a tus zapatos
programme.desc: Un zapatero frustrado se encuentra una máquina de coser mágica que le permite ver el mundo de una nueva manera por entrar en la vida de sus clientes.

programme.title: Yo los declaro marido y... Larry
programme.desc: Chuck Levine y Larry Valentine son bomberos y muy buenos amigos. Cuando Larry, un hombre viudo, descubre que no puede nombrar a sus niños como los beneficiarios de la póliza de su seguro de vida, necesita un gran favor de Chuck: su firma como pareja. Los amigos inesperadamente se convierten en noticia y deben llevar su plan al extremo cuando un burócrata sospecha de la veracidad de su relación.

programme.title: Una Navidad en apuros
programme.desc: Boyd es obligado a pasar la Navidad en la casa de sus padres y tiene que viajar por carretera con su excéntrico padre para llegar con los regalos navideños de su hijo antes del amanecer.

programme.title: Ciudad del silencio
programme.desc: Lauren Adrian, una reportera de Chicago, viaja a México para investigar los asesinatos sin resolver de cientos de mujeres que han ocurrido durante años cerca de una fábrica de origen estadounidense. Lauren se reúne con Alfonso Díaz, su examante y colega, quien publica las muertes a pesar de las amenazas de las autoridades locales. Los dos juntos buscan la verdad e intentan ayudar a la sobreviviente de un brutal ataque.

programme.title: Juego de espías
programme.desc: El día de su jubilación, el veterano agente de la CIA Nathan Muir recibe la noticia de que su discípulo, Tom Bishop, se ha metido en un buen lío: acusado de espionaje, se encuentra en una prisión china y será ejecutado en un plazo de 24 horas.

Así, bajo la mirada del detective Brikowski (Stanley Tucci) y el ampliamente reconocido asesino Goodkat (Bruce Willis), Slevin deberá idear un plan para salvar su vida antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Entrevistas con guionistas aclamados, como Aaron Sorkin, Darren Aronofsky, Fatih Akin, Jordan Peele, Anthony McCarten y Emily Gordon.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Justin Timberlake, John Legend, Pharrell Williams, Alicia Keys y Tori Amos conversan sobre sus canciones que aparecen en películas.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Los realizadores de documentales Amy Berg, Kirby Dick, Liz Garbus, Alex Gibney, Michael Moore y Elizabeth Chai Vasarhelyi hablan sobre avalanchas, fiduciarios espinosos y amenazas de muerte.

programme.title: Adultos a la fuerza
programme.desc: Jake, un empresario enamorado de sí mismo, sufre un accidente a pocos momentos del lanzamiento de su empresa. El fallido intento y el caos en su vida lo obligan a mudarse con su hermana embarazada y el marido de ésta, lejos del ruido de Manhattan. En el seno de la familia de su hermana, Jake se redescubre mientras cuida a su sobrino.

programme.title: Nuestra historia de amor y música
programme.desc: A Liam y Natalie los unió la música, pero, diez años más tarde, la banda sonora que acompaña a su amor ha dejado de sonar. Al separarse, tienen que repartirse su colección de música, aunque hay tantos recuerdos asociados a ella que no pueden hacerlo.

programme.title: Al diablo con el amor
programme.desc: Genevieve es una florista que tiene un peculiar modo de ver la vida. Tras haber sufrido demasiado, debido a las decepciones amorosas, la joven ha decidido no tener más relaciones largas para evitar sufrir. Sin embargo, esta declaración de intenciones se ve truncada cuando conoce a Greg, el dueño de un restaurante que tampoco ha tenido demasiada suerte en el amor. Entre ellos surgirá una atracción difícil de evitar.

programme.title: Papá por Accidente
programme.desc: Cuando Kassie cumple los cuarenta decide no esperar más y recurre a la inseminación artificial para tener un bebé. Cuando siete años más tarde regresa a Nueva York, vuelve a ver a su amigo Wally, que se siente fuertemente vinculado al hijo de Kassie.

programme.title: Experta en bodas
programme.desc: La más prestigiosa organizadora de bodas de San Francisco se enamora de un pediatra que resulta ser su próximo cliente.

programme.title: El mundo de Alexis
programme.desc: Alexis se enfrenta con la muerte de su esposo y regresa a casa para un funeral. Su hermana convence a Alexis para que regrese a su antigua carrera como organizadora de fiestas mientras ella inicia un nuevo romance.

programme.title: Asesino a sueldo
programme.desc: Una situación de identidad equivocada pone a un hombre llamado Slevin (Josh Hartnett) en medio de una guerra entre dos grandes del crimen en Nueva York : El Rabbi (Ben Kingsley) y el Boss (Morgan Freeman). Así, bajo la mirada del detective Brikowski (Stanley Tucci) y el ampliamente reconocido asesino Goodkat (Bruce Willis), Slevin deberá idear un plan para salvar su vida antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

programme.title: Atrapen al gringo
programme.desc: Durante una persecución con la patrulla fronteriza, Driver estrella su auto contra el muro de la frontera. Tras ser apresado por las autoridades mexicanas, es enviado a una prisión de alta seguridad, donde recibe la inesperada ayuda de un niño de diez años que conoce como pocos el lugar.

programme.title: Gánster americano
programme.desc: Frank Lucas utiliza su propia ingenuidad para llegar a la cima del crimen organizado del Harlem tras la muerte de su jefe, pero Richie Roberts, un policía excluido, busca la forma de llevar a su oponente ante la justicia.

programme.title: Ciudad del silencio
programme.desc: Lauren Adrian, una reportera de Chicago, viaja a México para investigar los asesinatos sin resolver de cientos de mujeres que han ocurrido durante años cerca de una fábrica de origen estadounidense. Lauren se reúne con Alfonso Díaz, su examante y colega, quien publica las muertes a pesar de las amenazas de las autoridades locales. Los dos juntos buscan la verdad e intentan ayudar a la sobreviviente de un brutal ataque.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Las mujeres protagonistas más divertidas de la televisión, Rachel Bloom, Gina Rodriguez, Allison Janney, Niecy Nash, Lily Tomlin e Ilana Glazer, revelan los mejores consejos que recibieron.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Pamela Adlon, Minnie Driver, America Ferrera, Kathryn Hahn, Issa Rae y Emmy Rossum son las protagonistas de las comedias de 2017.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Los comediantes Jeffrey Tambor, Aziz Ansari, Anthony Anderson, Tony Hale, Jerrod Carmichael, Rob Lowe, Keegan-Michael Key, hablan sobre todo lo relacionado con la comedia.

programme.title: Close Up With The Hollywood Reporter
programme.desc: Un debate en el que participan las actrices Nicole Kidman, Reese Witherspoon, Elizabeth Moss, Chrissy Metz, Oprah Winfrey y Jessica Lange, quienes hablan sobre su profesión.

programme.title: Aún más bella
programme.desc: Lucie está en remisión y su enfermedad es casi un recuerdo lejano. Su familia la empuja a vivir la vida al máximo, y al hacerlo, Lucie conoce al encantador y arrogante Clovis, quien se deja seducir por su ingenio y humor.

programme.title: Brillantísima
programme.desc: Después de que su esposo la dejara en la víspera de Navidad, Angela está decidida a cambiar su vida. Con el apoyo de su mejor amiga, su madre y su psiquiatra, ella intentará sobrevivir a los desafíos posmatrimoniales.

programme.title: Salvando a Santa
programme.desc: Después de estrellar su trineo, Santa Claus le pide a su padre e hijo ayuda para recuperar a sus renos y regresar a casa.

programme.title: Una Navidad en apuros
programme.desc: Boyd es obligado a pasar la Navidad en la casa de sus padres y tiene que viajar por carretera con su excéntrico padre para llegar con los regalos navideños de su hijo antes del amanecer.

programme.title: Una pareja más tonta
programme.desc: Tras descubrir que necesita un trasplante de riñón y que tiene una hija, Harry Dunne emprende un viaje en carretera con su amigo Lloyd Christmas.

programme.title: Zapatero a tus zapatos
programme.desc: Un zapatero frustrado se encuentra una máquina de coser mágica que le permite ver el mundo de una nueva manera por entrar en la vida de sus clientes.

programme.title: The Magicians
programme.desc: Kady lidera una revolución de las brujas que no estudiaron en la Escuela de Magia. Mientras tanto, se revela que Zelda ha estado viendo a su hija.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Nick descubre que alguien esta "incubando" un monstruo como resultado de un pasado oscuro; Monroe recibe un mensaje perturbador.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Cuando personas sin hogar desaparecen en Portland, Nick descubre un mercado negro que provee órganos humanos al mundo "Grimm".

programme.title: Héroes
programme.desc: Una muerte misteriosa pone a Claire frente a los reflectores. Angela se preocupa porque Nathan descubra su verdadera identidad. Un visitante inesperado embruja a Matt.

programme.title: Sharknado: Tornado de tiburones
programme.desc: Un huracán inunda las calles de Los Ángeles y, como consecuencia, cientos de hambrientos tiburones devoran todo a su paso y siembran el caos en la ciudad.

programme.title: El imperio de los tiburones
programme.desc: En un futuro, la mayor parte de la superficie del planeta se encuentra cubierta de agua. La única porción de tierra es gobernada por un señor de la guerra y su ejército de tiburones. Los seres humanos son mantenidos secuestrados como alimento para los tiburones. Dos amigos rehenes intentarán escapar y enfrentar a su captor.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Un genio convierte a Prue en una adolescente, da a Phoebe la habilidad de volar, y convierte al ex amor de Piper en un viejo.

programme.desc: Prue y Phoebe mienten durante un juicio de asesinato, liberando al asesino y arriesgando la vida de un asistente abogado fiscal.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Cuando el grupo se hace amigo de Pie Grande en el bosque, Kid Danger y Capitán Man intentan ayudarlo a deshacerse de un cazador molesto que quiere atraparlo.

programme.desc: Nikki está triste por su ruptura con Sean. Adele usa la conexión de Ben y Tommy a su favor. Anna y Noah se preparan para la reunión crucial con el ministro de protección ambiental.

programme.title: El misterio de los Hunter
programme.desc: Max se despierta y descubre que sus nuevos padres de acogida se han desvanecido, por lo que, junto a sus nuevos hermanos y hermanas, emprende una aventura para encontrarlos.

programme.title: El misterio de los Hunter
programme.desc: Los chicos no van a la escuela para poder buscar a sus padres desaparecidos, y encuentran más información de la que esperaban cuando investigan en la biblioteca.

programme.title: 12 corazones
programme.desc: Programa de concurso picante, ligero y excitante, dirigido a la audiencia joven hispana, presentado por Penélope Menchaca, el cual busca formar una o varias parejas entre los concursantes que se gusten y se sientan atraídos. Los doce concursantes, entre hombres y mujeres representan los 12 signos zodiacales, ellos se van eliminando mutuamente si no encuentran pareja. Los participantes comparan la apariencia, puntos de vista y personalidad. Penélope está acompañada de uno de los dos presentadores que aparecen en diferentes episodios, el astrólogo Edward'O que explica la personalidad de los concursantes basada en sus signos zodiacales y Maximiliano Palacio que comparte ideas y pensamientos poéticos relacionados con el amor. Cada episodio tiene una temática especial, como: "Especial de Salvavidas"; "Especial de las Piernas"; "Especial de Autos", entre muchos más.

programme.desc: Después de la muerte de sus padres, el joven heredero Bruce Wayne se convierte en un vengador enmascarado que lucha contra las fuerzas del mal en Ciudad Gótica.

programme.title: Batman: El caballero de la noche
programme.desc: Batman tiene que mantener el equilibrio entre el heroísmo y el vigilantismo para pelear contra un vil criminal conocido como el Guasón, que pretende sumir Ciudad Gótica en la anarquía.

programme.title: Asalto al camión blindado
programme.desc: Empleados de una compañía de camiones blindados planean un robo en contra de su propia empresa.

programme.title: ¿Qué pasó ayer? Parte III
programme.desc: Phil, Stu y Doug llevan a Alan a un viaje por carretera para ayudarlo a superar una crisis personal. Mientras tanto, el Sr. Chow sale de prisión y se prepara para desatar un caos.

programme.title: La huérfana
programme.desc: Devastados por la pérdida de su bebé nonato, Kate y John deciden adoptar una niña. En el orfanato, ambos se enamoran de una pequeña llamada Esther, y muy pronto la pareja lleva a su nueva hija a casa. Pero cuando se desarrollan una serie de eventos misteriosos, Kate empieza a sospechar que algo endemoniado se oculta detrás del rostro angelical de la niña.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: John Wick, un exasesino a sueldo, se enfrenta al mafioso Viggo Tarazov, quien ofrece una recompensa a aquel que logre acabar con la vida de Wick.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Entrevistas con celebridades.

programme.title: El lado luminoso de la vida
programme.desc: Después de perder su casa, su trabajo, su esposa y pasar ocho meses en prisión, Pat Solatano termina con sus padres. Está decidido a reconstruir su vida y reunirse con su esposa, sin embargo sus padres insisten con compartir su obsesión por las Águilas de Filadelfia. Las cosas se complican cuando Pat conoce a Tiffany, que le ofrece ayuda para reencontrarse con su esposa si a cambio hace algo muy importante.

programme.title: StarDog y TurboCat
programme.desc: Un perro perdido y un gato genio se embarcan en un viaje por el espacio para regresar a casa. Sin embargo, deberán tener cuidado con la prohibición de mascotas que impuso un policía enojado.

programme.title: El ilusionista
programme.desc: Viena, 1900. El ilusionista Eisenheim compite con el príncipe Leopold, heredero del Imperio austrohúngaro, por recuperar el amor de la mujer que en el pasado lo quiso. Entretanto, el príncipe, quien sospecha de él, manda vigilarlo.

programme.title: Batman inicia
programme.desc: Después de la muerte de sus padres, el joven heredero Bruce Wayne se convierte en un vengador enmascarado que lucha contra las fuerzas del mal en Ciudad Gótica.

programme.title: Escalofríos
programme.desc: Zach llega a un pequeño y aburrido pueblo, donde pronto hace amistad con la vecina. Descubre que su padre es el escrito R. L. Stine, autor de los libros de terror "Escalofríos", y que todos los monstruos que Stine describió en sus obras son reales. Estos seres diabólicos escapan y, ahora, con la ayuda del propio escritor, de su hija y de un amigo, intentará de encerrarlos de nuevo.

programme.title: El caza recompensas
programme.desc: Milo Boyd, un cazarrecompensas que no pasa por su mejor momento, recibe el trabajo de sus sueños: debe encontrar a su exesposa, una reportera que ha violado su libertad condicional.

programme.title: Pompeii: La furia del volcán
programme.desc: En los días previos a la erupción del monte Vesubio, un esclavo intenta salvar a la mujer que ama antes de que la ciudad colapse.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Un consejo anónimo lleva al equipo hasta una bodega abandonada, en donde esperan encontrar a uno de los criminales más buscados de la ciudad.

programme.title: CSI

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane y sus colegas hacen una operación encubierta peligrosa, esperando capturar a ladrones de joyas; tensión entre un agente y Lisbon.

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane y el FBI intentan exonerar a un convicto inocente dos días antes de su ejecución.

programme.title: The Mentalist

programme.title: Netas divinas
programme.desc: Conversaciones informales e íntimas con personajes reconocidos del mundo del espectáculo y de otras áreas como el deporte, la política, etc. Las presentadoras del programa son poco convencionales y muy bellas, gracias a sus talentos y capacidad de conectar con los famosos, ayudan a conocer de forma más profunda a los famosos, creando una conexión humana entre el público admirador y sus ídolos. El público puede encontrar similitudes con estos personajes que no son tan distintos como las personas comunes, aunque su estilo de vida es diferente. Las presentadoras también exponen sus vivencias personales, sus experiencias profesionales, sus opiniones y sus sentimientos.

programme.title: Veredicto final
programme.desc: La moderadora del programa de realidad de una hora sobre asuntos legales es la jueza Cristina Pereyra. En este escenario que a la vez es una corte jurídica, en el que ella preside y modera entre el acusador y el demandado, ella utiliza su vasto conocimiento en el área del derecho, escucha a las dos partes y analiza las pruebas presentadas ante la corte con el fin de hacer su "Veredicto Final", como lo indica literalmente el título del programa. La honorable Jueza fue defensora pública anteriormente y luego estuvo encargada de presidir como Jueza en casos criminales, civiles, de familia y violencia doméstica entre otros, una experiencia que la llenó de gran sabiduría para arbitrar y solucionar los conflictos que las personas expusieron ante su corte.

programme.title: Esta historia me suena

programme.title: Carita de Ángel
programme.desc: Luciano descubre que Cecilia tiene leucemia. Frida idea un plan para deshacerse del pato de Dulce María. Lupita y Rogelio logran casarse y por ello lo celebran con una gran fiesta en compañía de sus familiares y amigos.

programme.title: Entre el amor y el odio
programme.desc: Ana Cristina y Octavio tendrán que traspasar las barreras de las mentiras y enfrentarse al sentimiento que los condena. Rodeados de malas intenciones, sobrepasarán cada uno los problemas hasta llegar a estar juntos sin importar el pasado.

programme.title: La reina del flow
programme.desc: Gema trata de arreglar sus problemas con Charly para estar juntos de nuevo, pero él la rechaza. Juancho le cuenta a Cata que Charly mandó a matar a Yeimy cuando estaba en prisión.

programme.title: La usurpadora
programme.desc: El millonario Maldonado ordena a Braulio localizar a la señora Bracho. Paola piensa que nadie sabe de la suplantación. Mojarras le aconseja a doña Chabela que busque a la familia de Carlitos.

programme.title: Guerreros 2020
programme.desc: Veinte participantes están dispuestos a todo para ganar semanalmente un premio. Los guerreros tendrán que superar retos que exigirán tanto su esfuerzo físico y mental, mientras que son juzgados por el implacable tribunal.

programme.title: Nosotros los guapos
programme.desc: Vítor y Albertano se convierten en guías durante un campamento y los niños viven una experiencia no muy divertida.

programme.title: Nosotros los guapos

programme.title: Hasta que el dinero nos separe
programme.desc: Rafael es enviado a la cárcel por agredir a Guillermo. Alejandra trata de persuadir a Guillermo para liberar a Rafael. La Generala le pide a los vendedores que ayuden a Rosaura. Marco trata de investigar si Rafael y Alejandra están juntos.

programme.title: El color de la pasión
programme.desc: Marcelo está a punto de confesarle a Lucía que Rebeca era amante de Federico, pero Alonso los interrumpe. Rebeca le confiesa a Lucía que ella era amante de Federico y Marcelo quiere vengarse de ella.

programme.title: Pájaro soñador

programme.title: Esta historia me suena
programme.desc: Una mujer de ojos claros, harta del comportamiento manipulador de su esposo Rubén, le pide el divorcio, pero su hija enferma del corazón, al escuchar la noticia, se desmaya y es llevada al hospital.

programme.title: Mita y mita
programme.desc: Néstor se gana la lotería, pero pierde el boleto, y hace lo que sea para recuperarlo. Silvio le dice a Néstor que si se divorcia de Olivia tendrá que darle la mitad del dinero que ganó.

programme.title: Mita y mita
